Jaydev hasn't learnt. Keeps giving width and keeps getting whacked! Russell clears his front leg and slaps this to the extra cover boundary. Very poor

just over Samson's outstretched hands at wide long-on!  This is a slower length ball that spins away from outside off, Russell backs away and fetches this slap from outside off, ends up dragging it but still manages enough
steps out and wallops this length ball to sweeper cover
scooped him up and over the keeper's head, straight scoop for six. Half-century for DK. He was looking away while trying to use the pace, got a big, fat top-edge that just flew. This is injustice
rocks back and cuts straight to backward point. Superb over.
through with the pull too early, this googly spun back in, took ages to arrive. Hits him in the midriff. Could've had a cup of tea and then pull
square turn from leg stump to take a thick outside edge that rolls to short third man. Squared up completely
too short, misses out! Rocks back to pull, gets it high on the bat, manages to squirt this down to long on
makes room and punches this short delivery to sweeper cover
square turn from length, stops on him as Russell goes back and across to defend
length ball on middle, and going down the leg side. But Russell manages to clip it off his pads to deep midwicket
maximum use of the free hit! Full on leg stump, and Russell gets his front leg out of the way before depositing it over the long-on boundary. Raw power
short on middle, and goes straight through to Klaasen again. Russell chooses not to play any shot, knowing that's too high. No ball for height. Free hit
short! Pitches on middle, and soars straight through to Klaasen. Russell had made some room to pull, perhaps, but played no shot
length ball outside off, but Russell was thinking of making room already. Eventually forced to reach at it, and punches it to cover

cramps him for space, and finds the edge! Back of a length on off and zipping straight through. Gill chose to cut, but it was close to his body. Finds the bat's top edge, and Klaasen makes no mistake. An exciting innings comes to an end
thumped! Through point this time! Loose ball first up. Wide outside off, and Gill sent this powerfully for four
there's the fifty partnership! Yuuuge over. Half-tracker outside off and Karthik rocks back to earn some extra time. Swivels, and then pulls it over cow corner. Expensive!
length ball on off, but spinning into Gill. Taps it off the back foot to point
going, going, gone! Teases Archer at long off, but goes just beyond him. Full on off, and Gill was quick to shimmy down the ground. Full swing of the bat thereafter
good length outside off, and that's been cut furiously past point! Proper cricket shot, and that breaches the infield. KKR getting a move on, now
full outside off, and turning further away. Driven with the bat's open face to cover point on this occasion
flat on off, and DK walks across to the off side. Gets down on one knee, and paddles it to deep backward square. Work for Unadkat in the deep

not afraid to flight the ball. Lands on middle, and entices the batsman to drive. Gill's through with his shot early, and it comes off his toe end. Still manages to find enough behind it, to take it to the fielder at long off
flighted on off, and he comes down the wicket before driving to long on. Easy single
back of a length, on middle and leg. Gill goes onto the back foot and turns it off his pads to midwicket
whipped! Full on off, and he drags it to wide long on. Great uses of the wrists to direct it there, but Binny's dive ensures it's not a four. More runs saved by Binny tonight
flighted, and lands full on off. Karthik takes a big stride forward, gets to the pitch of the ball, and then drives through the delivery's line. Goes to long off
length ball on middle, and turning across the batsman's body. Punched off the back foot towards midwicket on this occasion
pitches on middle, and that's been flicked to square leg. The region's vacant so they take a quick single. Gill wants the second, but that's a resounding 'no' from DK
length ball, wide outside off. Which basically means it's a googly. Gill rocks back, and punches it straight. Gopal stops it on his follow through
flat on middle and leg, and worked off his pads to deep backward square. They walk across for the one
full just outside off, and spinning into DK this time. Defended off the back foot
attempts that Kohli-esque inside out drive, but can only play it to long off. It was full on off, and tempting for the youngster
tossed up on off, and driven off the front foot. Excellent stop by Tripathi there to keep it down to one
off the bat's shoulder, but lands safe! Length ball on off, but takes some extra bounce. He tried to nudge it towards the leg side, but the ball flies away towards point instead
back of a length on the fourth-stump line, and Gill punches it off the back foot. Plays it square to the cover point region on this occasion
uses the pace to play it fine, and KKR are third time lucky! Sodhi was fine enough, but this time the ball flew off the bat, and third man can't cut it off
fuller, and just outside off. Driven to Gopal at mid off this time
carbon copy, and this time it's a more composed stop from Sodhi. Length ball outside off once again, and DK uses his wrists to open his bat's face late
steered fine down to the third man fielder! Sodhi's dive stops the boundary. It was a length ball outside off, that DK opted to open his bat's face to
googly which he didn't get to the pitch off, thick inside edge past leg stump to short fine leg
right to the pitch as he eases this, backward point swoops in to prevent a single. Gowtham, I think it is
whips this length ball from outside off towards deep midwicket
googly which he gets to the pitch of as he eases this to cover point for a quick single
turn from length on off, steered to backward point
gentle little tickle down leg. Too short and drifting down, DK went back and used the pace to deflect it expertly.
gets right to the pitch of the ball as he drives this to sweeper cover
punches this googly towards deep midwicket
turns this gently into the leg side for a quick single. Got close to the ball as he smothered that
shapes to cut but doesn't pick the googly, there's bounce on this too as he's cramped for room, rolls back to the bowler. Hit him near the glove.
goes back into the crease and defends back to Sodhi
steered this behind point, Unadkat runs behind and slides to stop that but can't prevent the second

punched straight back to Shreyas. Big wicket! Another googly that he lands on length outside off, this stopped on Lynn as he looked to punch, checked his stroke and Shreyas takes the simple offering on his followthrough. KKR in some trouble.
looks to sweep but this was spinning away sharply from outside off. Beaten

gets across the stumps to go over the leg side, changes his stroke and defends to the off side.  Confusion, confusion.  Lynn calls for the single, stops. DK is three-four steps forward and then turns back. All good in the end.
whips this shortish delivery into the gap at deep midwicket
googly that spins back in sharply from outside off, defended to cover
drifting into middle and leg, turned to short fine for a quick single
opens the bat face slightly to drive to the left of cover
driven straight to extra cover. Got to the pitch nicely but no timing
goes back and across to work this through midwicket, but this hits him high on the bat and rolls back to the bowler
checks his shot, punched on the bounce to cover. Square turn for Sodhi, but a touch slow
touch short and spinning away from off, punched to sweeper cover
googly but touch short, he mistimes a pull to short fine leg
full on off, he leans forward and eases this straight to cover. Expensive over.
slower and fuller on middle, punched wide of mid-off for a quick single
slower length ball outside off, Lynn is down on one knee as he slaps this up and over cover. Disdainfully done
shortens his length but angles this wide, DK steered this behind square but Binny puts out a dive at short third man to save three runs
another teasing half-volley outside off, belted through the line between cover and mid-off. Very poor from the most expensive Royals' buy.
fuller outside off, DK leans into this wide half-volley and lofts this inside-out over cover point. Lovely
just a bit of extra rip for the final ball. Full on off, and worked off his legs to the backward square region. Enough time to come back for the second
length ball just outside off, and defended back to Gowtham off the back foot. Keeping it tidy
length ball on off, and that's been punched down the ground. Mid on's there
length ball on middle, and DK works it off his pads to the fielder at deep midwicket. He collects the single
full on off, and turning into his pads. Muscled down the ground to long on for a walking single
almost a yorker on leg stump. Lynn carefully pushes it back towards the non-striker
and almost goes there first up! It was full on middle, and DK comfortably whips it off his legs past the square-leg region. Well timed, and there's no one there in the deep. Four welcome runs for KKR
full on off, and defended off the front foot. Tapped back to the bowler.
disaster! Mistimed to midwicket. Full on off, and Rana looks for the release shot. Attempts to slog it over midwicket, but it's sliced. Easy as ABC for Unadkat
short! This time it's aimed on middle stump, and Rana backs away trying to cut it over slip. Pulls out of the shot eventually though
length ball outside off, but angling in slightly. Opens his bat's face and taps it through cover point. Chase for the man in the deep, but he manages to intercept
Back of a length, but outside off stump. Rana chooses to shoulder his arms, and the carry to the keeper is quite promising
wants a single, but sent back! Full just outside off, and carved off the front foot to cover point. Lynn's halfway down, but he's been asked to go back
just a bit more air offered, and Lynn smacks this through the cover region. Winds up early, waits for the ball to land, and then slaps it through the off side
full on off, and driven with the spin towards the non-striker
length ball outside off, but spinning into Lynn. Stands tall and slaps it off the front foot. But straight to cover
full just outside off, and he leans into the cover drive. Pushed into the gap on the off side to get off the mark

leading edge, and caught by the bowler! Tossed it up, and Uthappa tried to work it towards the leg side. Through his shot too early, and the ball lobs straight back to KG. Big jump from the big man, and he manages to hold on to it. Two wickets in seven balls for Gowtham
quick single to end the over. Back of a length once more, but Uthappa gets inside the line of the ball and defends with soft hands. Cover's too far, so Uthappa can call for the run
back of a length on off, but Archer's really getting some pace. The ball gets some extra bounce, and hits his glove. Uthappa was merely trying to defend it off the front foot
length ball on off, and angling in once more. Uthappa adjusts on this occasion, and nudges it off his body towards the leg side. Doesn't look comfortable at all
carbon copy! Pitches on middle, but the ball shapes into his body and then down the leg side. The umpire spreads his arms wide again
shaping into the right-hander, but just a bit too much! Back of a length on middle, but angling down the leg side
mistimed this time. Archer pitched it on middle, but the ball jagged in sharply. Hits the shoulder of his bat, and goes towards square leg
quick! Full on middle, but going down the leg side. Lynn did go chasing after it, but couldn't manage to clip it off his hips
length ball just outside off, and angling in slightly. Uthappa drops his gloves and plays it towards the leg side off the back foot
drops just short of mid on! It was full on off, and Lynn goes for a slog towards the leg side. Comes off the bat's inside half and lobs in the air. Lands between midwicket and mid on
gone through everybody! Attempts the reverse sweep, but the ball spins sharply down the leg side. Won't be called a wide since Uthappa changed his stance, but Klaasen can't hold onto that either
full just outside off, and nicely driven straight down the ground. Gowtham gets his hands behind the ball, but it ricochets towards mid off. They jog across for one
full outside off, and spinning into Lynn. Tries to drive it towards midwicket, but it takes a leading edge! Falls in front of cover point
length ball on off, and spinning into Uthappa. Keeps his eyes on the ball and nudges it off his pads to the leg side

aaaand stumped! Narine came dancing down the wicket, but Gowtham dropped his length. Pitches it just outside off and the ball spins away from Narine. He misses, and Klaasen whips the bails off in no time. Big, big wicket!
slapped for four! Starts around the wicket, and pitches outside off. Narine backs away, makes some extra room, and crunches this past the diving cover fielder. Tripathi the man who couldn't stop it

short_text: Bhuvneshwar to du Plessis, SIX runs
long_text: Straight drive over the bowler's head, and Faf du Plessis has taken CSK into the IPL final! Seventh time in their history. The Wankhede's gone ballistic. It was full on off, and Faf went for the big one. Proper follow through of the bat and the ball lands just beyond the boundary line.

full on middle, and he's smashed a straight drive over the bowler's head! Would you believe it. The apparent villain of CSK's bowling effort has turned on the heat and how! CSK need six off the final over
full on off, and he bunts it down the ground to long off. They're going for a suicidal second, but Faf manages to complete the run! What a sprint from Faf.
knuckle ball just outside off, and Faf manages to push it towards cover. Just a single on offer this time. CSK need 12 off eight balls
full outside off, but the ball shapes further away. Goes beyond the tramlines, and umpire Erasmus says extras
full just outside off, and muscled over the bowler's head. Dhawan's at long off. One run to the total, but importantly Faf's on strike

Lucky, lucky, lucky! What some like to call the French cut. Length ball on off, and angling into Shardul. He tried to punch it straight, but the ball came in, took the inside edge, and went past the keeper's left for four more
low full toss outside off, and he's edged it between the keeper and a fine short third man. It was a yorker just outside off, but Thakur manages to find some bat on it. He'll take it. CSK'll take it

short_text: Brathwaite to du Plessis, FOUR runs
long_text: full outside off, and Faf connects with the square drive! Carves it past cover point, and the man in the deep can't cut it off either! Classic CSK. Twenty-three runs needed off 12

short_text: Brathwaite to du Plessis, 1 run, OUT
long_text: full on off, and that's been creamed through the cover region. Looks like four, except Rashid's tumbling effort stops that at wide long off. Recovers quickly, and throws it in flat at the bowler's end. Brathwaite collects, and then brings the stumps down with his right hand. Harbhajan's nowhere near!

short_text: Brathwaite to du Plessis, FOUR runs
long_text: slower ball, on a good length. It pitches on off, and Faf tries to pull it square. He's deceived by the pace, and the ball comes off Faf's bottom edge. That takes the ball finer than he would've like, but Faf won't mind. Gone for four

short_text: Brathwaite to du Plessis, SIX runs
long_text: full on leg, and that's been deposited into cow corner! Fifty for Faf! It pitched just ahead of his front leg, and Faf's enjoying the extra pace. Gets his front leg out of the way, and swings his bat thoroughly

short_text: Brathwaite to du Plessis, FOUR runs
long_text: overpitched outside off, and that's been drilled over cover! Manages to get his bat under this delivery, and powerfully lifts it over the infield
slower ball, but full outside off. Big wind up from Harbhajan, but he mistimes a leg-side slog. The ball goes past Faf to long on. Importantly, gets off strike.
back of a length outside off, and Harbhajan pulls it to the fielder at deep midwicket. Kaul's happy to concede a single off the final ball. That means Bhajji's back on strike
yorker, and just outside off. Harbhajan tries to open his bat's face, to run it down fine, but misses completely! That's zero off seven balls for Harbhajan
low full toss outside off, and that's been slapped to cover. The shot was good enough to beat the infielder, but KW's diving effort stops the boundary
full on leg, and Harbhajan attempts to flick it towards the leg side. Hits his front leg, though, and that's enough for CSK to take a single
knuckle ball outside off, and Harbhajan can't even connect with the drive. The ball angled away slightly after pitching, and that, perhaps, put the batsman off. Through to Goswami
on off stunmp, and he tries to lift it over the bowler's head. Timed well, but it's in the air! Lucky for him, it drops short of Brathwaite at long on

short_text: Rashid Khan to Harbhajan, no run
long_text: ripping legbreak, beats the outside edge. Good length, angling in, then bursts away past the hanging bat

short_text: Rashid Khan to Harbhajan, no run
long_text: full on a fourth-stump line, defended back to the bowler

short_text: Rashid Khan to Harbhajan, no run
long_text: really full and outside off, squeezed to the left of short cover

short_text: Rashid Khan to Harbhajan, no run
long_text: googly, inside-edged to short fine leg

short_text: Rashid Khan to du Plessis, 1 run
long_text: full and dips on off, driven past the left of the bowler to long-off

short_text: Rashid Khan to du Plessis, no run
long_text: quicker googly from Rashid, zips back in and pins the front pad below the knee-roll. The finger goes up. Faf asks for a review. No inside edge but this seems to be heading down the leg side. The tracker suggests it's going down leg

Is that a clean catch from Brathwaite? He does not claim the catch. The soft signal from umpire Erasmus is out. They go to the TV umpire now. He dives forward, Brathwaite stretches his hands out, and wraps his fingers around it. Or did that bounce into the turf and into the hands. The close-ups are quite blurry. No conclusive evidence. TV umpire Ravi does not have conclusive evidence to overturn the soft signal. Chahar has to go. This was full and outside off, dragged off the bottom of the bat to long-on. Excellent effort from that man Carlos Brathwaite
slower ball, dips at off, 116ks, Faf leading-edges it to the covers

short_text: Sandeep to du Plessis, FOUR runs
long_text: a bit too full and outside off, Faf gets under the length and scythes it up and over Williamson at short cover

short_text: Sandeep to du Plessis, no run
long_text: back of a length and outside off, knuckle ball at 111ks, stabbed back to the right of the bowler. Faf sends Chahar back
full-toss on off, stretches out and drives to long-off
slower short ball, sits up outside off, Chahar reads the change-up. Delays his big shot and slugs it over midwicket for a flat six

short_text: Shakib to du Plessis, SIX runs
long_text: drilled over long on! Tossed up on off, and Faf takes a big stride forward, before thumping it over the non-striker's head. The crowd erupts, and time for the time out

short_text: Shakib to du Plessis, FOUR runs
long_text: back of a length on leg, and angling further in. Faf makes room on the leg side, and drags a shot to the region between deep midwicket and long on. Two men converging, but Pandey fluffs the sliding attempt. Hits his hands and rolls into the boundary
full on off, but turning away from the right hander. Knocks it past the non-striker to the vacant mid-on region. Shakib goes running behind it
full on middle, and angling into his pads. Pushed down the ground - off the front foot - to long on
full just on off, and driven down the ground to long off. Enough time to walk across for the single
full just outside off, and that's been muscled away to deep point. The ball went squarer than he would've wanted
knuckle ball outside off, and Faf chooses to chop it down to backward point. Early call for the run, and he'll keep strike
sticks with the slower ball, this time a length ball just outside off. Faf gets inside the line of the ball, works it off his pads to the leg side, and takes off for a couple more
good length, just outside off, and he pushes at it with soft hands. Played in the gap in front of cover, and Chahar gets off the mark

another caught and bowled! The slower ball does it again. Back of a length on middle, but he's through his front-foot defense too early. Tries to check his straight drive, but still can't do enough. Hits the top half of the bat and lobs straight into Sandeep's hands. Replays suggest that was the knuckleball
accurate! Pitches on off, and keeps it tight. Too close to Jadeja's body to play it anyway. Chooses to fend it off the back foot
starts off with the slower ball. Length ball, but back of a hand. Faf comes down the wicket, adjusts his shot, and then tucks it to the fielder at square leg

short_text: Rashid Khan to Jadeja, no run
long_text: appeal for lbw, but turned down! Inside edge, I think. Length ball on middle, and turning into Jadeja. Hits his front leg, and impact's in front of leg stump, but the edge saves him

short_text: Rashid Khan to du Plessis, 1 run
long_text: length ball outside off, and going straight through. Faf stands tall and slaps it past the point region to the fielder in the deep
full on off, but spinning away from Jadeja this time. Pushed off the front foot to the cove region. Plays it rather safely
full on middle, and turning towards the leg side. Nudges it off his pads to the backward square region

straight to first slip! Half tracker on off, really, but Bravo goes chasing after it. Tries to cut, but it's the legbreak from Rashid this time. Turned a lot, and took some extra bounce too, and Bravo has edged it to Gabbar

short_text: Rashid Khan to du Plessis, 1 run
long_text: length ball on off, and Faf goes deep into his crease. Punches it off his pads to the midwicket region
drops the length a bit, and lands on middle. It's angling into Faf, so he backs away, and bunts a pull to wide long on
they're choosing to deal with singles for now. Tossed up on off again, and driven to long off
full just outside off, and comfortably driven to the sweeper fielder on the off side
full on off, and pushed past the non-striker to the mid-on region. No one's there, so Shakib goes chasing behind it
full just outside off, and he tries to drive with the ball turning away. Mistimed towards cover
full on off, and worked off his toes to deep midwicket. Played with gentle hands, and that means they can easily jog back for the second

tries to play inside out over cover, but takes the bat's inside edge. These batsmen are having a rough time facing Rashid. It landed wide outside off, and enticed Bravo to drive. Comes in, and finds the bat's inside edge

short_text: Rashid Khan to Bravo, no run
long_text: full on off, and turning into his pads. Tries to whip it towards midwicket, but misses the shot. Hits his front leg, but it would've gone down leg

short_text: Rashid Khan to du Plessis, 1 run
long_text: the googly! But manages to tuck it towards short fine leg for a single. It landed on off, and came back in sharply

short_text: Rashid Khan to du Plessis, no run
long_text: full just outside off, and he misses the drive! Did the keeper drop it? Extra bounce forces the batsman to miss the drive. Replays show no edge

short_text: Rashid Khan to du Plessis, no run
long_text: full, and wide outside off. Tried the wrong'un, but doesn't jag back so much. Driven with the bat's open face to cover point this time

short_text: Rashid Khan to du Plessis, no run
long_text: flighted in, and lands just outside off. Driven straight back off the front foot
wide of the crease, back of a length and slanting in, impact in line but Bravo may have managed an inside edge
shortish and outside off, flat-batted away to sweeper cover

short_text: Brathwaite to du Plessis, SIX runs
long_text: banged in short and outside off, top-edged and it's a six at Wankhede. Banged in with extra effort, Faf hooks and skies it over deep square

short_text: Brathwaite to du Plessis, no run
long_text: short and skidding into the thigh, hits the thigh and rolls to midwicket

short_text: Brathwaite to du Plessis, no run
long_text: short and outside off, dragged off the inside half to short midwicket
rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and steers to third man
short legbreak outside off, scythed stylishly to sweeper cover

short_text: Rashid Khan to Bravo, no run
long_text: another wrong'un, Bravo does not read it either, plays around his front pad. Impact may have been outside off with Bravo shuffling across

Rashid bursts through the gate of Dhoni. Tom Moody in the dug out has a big smile and high-fives Hales. Another googly, good length, breaks back in from outside off, Dhoni does not read the variation either, reaches out for a drive and misses. Rashid hits middle stump. Dhoni goes and with it CSK's hopes?

short_text: Rashid Khan to du Plessis, 1 run
long_text: googly, breaks back in on off, Faf does not read it, inside-edged down to long-on
tossed outside off, slices a drive to deep point

short_text: Rashid Khan to Dhoni, no run
long_text: back of a length and skids through outside off, punched off the back foot to short cover
tickled off the pads to fine leg
wide of the crease again, short and springs off the surface outside off, Dhoni reaches out and carves to point
wide of the crease, short and holds its line outside off, jabbed to cover
fullish and slanting in, takes the inside edge and runs away to the leg side

short_text: Brathwaite to du Plessis, no run
long_text: back of a length and outside off, slashed away. Pandey SRH's gun fielder at backward point throws himself to his right and stops the ball with one hand. What a play
good length on middle, shuffles across and deflects it to fine leg
back of a length and slanted down leg. He begins with a leg-side wide

short_text: Kaul to du Plessis, no run
long_text: shorter and outside off, opens the face and jabs to point
Dhoni forays down the track, shorter and attacks the body, hooked straight to long leg
chest-high short ball on middle, 131ks, Dhoni rocks back and hooks it away to the left of long leg for four
full and outside off, Dhoni presses out and inside-edges it past leg stump to get off the mark after nine balls
Dhoni 0 off 8 balls now. Tuk tuk Dhoni. Full and outside off, no shot again from Dhoni
full and swinging in, Faf plays around his front pad and flicks to square leg
back of a length and zipping through the corridor, no shot again
full and slanting in from outside off, does not threaten off, Dhoni jumps across off and leaves
back of a length and outside off, left alone
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, jabbed to the covers
short and skids back in, Dhoni shuffles forward and across as he wears it on the thigh
full and angling in at off, bunted to mid-on, and they risk a quick single. Wild throw from Sandeep
full and nipping in at off, tapped to mid-on
full and angling in at off, forward and driven to mid-off

Cracking delivery from Kaul.. My ball of the tournament. This was the big dipper from Kaul, a la Malinga, swings away so very late. Opens up Rayudu, beats him on the outside edge, and hits off and middle. He sends Rayudu back for a first-ball duck and pumps his fist animatedly. Look at Williamson, he's pumped too. This defence is on

Kaul floors Raina's leg stump. Raina jumps across off, exposes his leg and middle stumps, and can't meet with a flick. Perhaps, he was expecting the short ball, especially with leg-gully in place. This was full, however, and Raina gave Kaul a free path to access it
full-toss outside off, Raina eases in to it and drives to the right of Pandey for four
Raina backs away to this off-stump yorker and carves it to the right of backward point. Excellent diving save from Sunrisers' gun fielder Pandey
short on off, Raina hops and taps to mid-on for one
full and angled down leg, Raina misses a flick, leg-side wide
full and outside off, checks his drive and guides it square through the off side

short_text: Bhuvneshwar to du Plessis, no run
long_text: Bhuvneshwar hits a hard length - neither driveable nor pullable - fended of

short_text: Bhuvneshwar to du Plessis, no run
long_text: back of a length and slanting in from wide of the crease, defended from off stump to the leg side
Raina jumps across off, gets inside the line of this short ball and flicks to deep square leg
back of a length and outside off, Raina rides the bounce and shovels it away to the left of deep square
straying into the pads again, clipped to long leg
sliding into the pads, Raina checks his flick and chips it in front of midwicket
full awayswinger, much better from Sandeep, left alone in the channel
make that a hat-trick of boundaries, and this is the best of the lot though this was overpitched and outside off. Raina presses forward and eases a drive straight of mid-off
full and wide outside off, Raina reaches out for the ball again. This time he scoops a drive in the air to the left of Williamson at short cover
short and wide outside off, Raina loves width, he reaches out for the ball and carves it away through the gap at point
picked off the pads to deep square leg
another gem of a ball from Bhuvneshwar. This finds the outside edge of Watson. Good length, angling in towards off stump, and swings away sharply, the opener hangs his bat out and nicks off
dug in shorter on off, jabbed back to Bhuvneshwar
Bhuvneshwar drags his length back on off, Watson stands tall and punchily plays it back to the bowler
big inswinger from Bhuvneshwar, full again, zips back in, Watson is rooted to the crease as he is pinned on the back pad. Replays suggest an inside edge. Height also a factor
gem of a ball from Bhuvneshwar first up. Full, angling in, then swings away outside off. Watson plays inside the line and is beaten

Dhoni finally hits the stumps! Off the innings' final ball, heh. Shardul goes short on middle, and Brathwaite misses the pull. They're off for a bye, but Dhoni finally finds his aim. Sunrisers end on 139 for 7

straight into the sightscreen! Brathwaite thinks the inning's over, and walking back into the pavillion, but he's asked to wait! One ball to go. It was a length ball, and wide outside off. Allows Brathwaite to open his chest and flat-bat it over the bowler's head
length ball on leg stump, and that's a wild, wild one! Brathwaite tries to pull it fine over short fine leg, but misses
full, but wide outside off. This time Brathwaite expected the line, and carves it over cover! Properly muscled over cover
juicy full toss outside off, and that's in his arc! Gets his front leg out of the way, and deposits this in the stands beyond long on

attempted ramp, that's been played in an ugly manner to deep midwicket. Low full toss on middle, and he had shuffled across to the off side. Can't play it fine enough, but still allows them to take the second
full and wide outside off. Shaping away from the batsman too, and he's forced to reach at it. Can't connect, but the umpire calls it as extras
yorker wide outside off.  Brathwaite slogs, but the shot comes off his toe end. Mid off intercepts
length ball outside off, and it's the slower one to end the over. Opens his bat's face and pokes at it gently. Trickles it down to third man. Final over coming up
outside off, and Bhuvi's done playing around. Wild swing, and sliced over cover. Falls juuust short of the man in the deep
big swing of the bat, but the ball goes straight to Dhoni. Length ball on off, but the ball takes some extra bounce after pitching. Bhuvi misses. Again
back of a length on off, but angling right into the batsman's chest. Checks his cut, and glances it to third man for a comfortable run
length ball on middle, and going down the leg side. He tries to paddle it over short fine leg, but can't connect
slower ball, and short outside off. Bhuvi tries to pull, but it's too wide for him to drag it square. Takes the bat's toe end, and goes down the ground instead

full, but outside off again. Tries for the big shot, and slices it over the infield. Bhajji cleans up at sweeper cover, but his throw is flat. Chance of a run out? Nope. Dhoni misses his flick, but Brathwaite's big strides would've saved him anyway
yorker, but way too wide outside off. No movement from Brathwaite, and umpire Erasmus calls it how it is
tries to lift this inside out over cover, but can't get the timing he's looking for. Goes to mid off on the bounce
second yorker in a row, and this time the off-stump line forces Brathwaite to stop skipping around. Mistimes his drive to cover
too cheeky, and Shardul gets away with a wide. It was full, but wide outside off, and Brathwaite tried to paddle it. Misses, but the umpire chooses to give the bowler the benefit of the doubt
and that's two in two. Can Brathwaite repeat his Kolkata performance? Length ball on off, and comfortable for the big man. Winds up, and then smashes this pull over wide long on.
Remember the name, part 2? Full on leg stump, and he gets his front leg out of the way, and thumps it into the midwicket boundary. The crowd's come aliiive!
ends his spell with a yorker. Aimed at leg stump, and squeezed back towards the non-striker

short on off, and that's been well pulled! It's sliding across the ground, but Jadeja's a beast in the deep. Covers a lot of ground in a flash, and his quick pick-up-and-throw ensures it's only a single
slow offcutter outside off, and jagging inwards. Big swing of the bat from Bhuvi, but he can't connect at all. Great disguise from Bravo
low full toss on off, and driven to the bowler. Mistimed, really
back of a length outside off, and that's been cut to Bhajji at point. Almost forgot he was in the field
slower ball, full on middle stump. Worked off his toes to deep backward square for a single
down the leg side again! Bravo appeals for the caught-behind, but the umpire's not interested. Calls it a wide again.
outta control! Slower ball, full on leg stump, and bouncing down the leg side. Bhuvi's happy to let this one go
good length just outside off, and pushed with soft hands to cover point. They scamper across in a flash
length ball outside off, and opens the bat's face once again. Trickles down to third man
he didn't have a clue! Proper pace. Good length just outside off and zipping straight through to Dhoni. Brathwaite did try to glance it fine, but his bat was nowhere near the ball
full on off, and pushed with the bat's open face. Goes down to third man
length ball on off, and defended off the back foot. Bhuvi carefully ensures the ball doesn't bounce back onto his stumps
good length just outside off, but jagging into his body. Opens his bat's face and chops it down to short third man

what a catch! Tumbling forward while completing it! The stadium is on fayahhh! It was full outside off, and Yusuf's drive comes off the bat's bottom half. Low catch on offer from Bravo, and he dives forward on his follow through, holds on to the catch, and then spectacularly does a somersault to regain control. My oh my!
slower ball outside off, and the cut's been slapped away! Enough room for the big man to finally free his arms, and that's been drilled to the sweeper cover boundary
yorker on off, and it's been dug away to backward point
back of a length on middle, and muscled off his hips to deep midwicket. Jadeja pulls out of his throw last ball
slower ball, and full on off. Brathwaite spots it, and waits for eternity, before whipping it to deep backward square
back of a length on middle, but going down the leg side. A soft appeal from the bowler - for caught behind - but no reaction from the umpire
full on leg, and he misses the flick down the leg side. Hits the outside of his pad, and oes to short fine leg. Brathwaite wants the run, but Yusuf sends him back

ends his spell with a boundary, but what a terrific spell this has been nonetheless. Length ball outside off, that he backs away and cuts past short third man. No stopping that once it beats the infielder
stopped by Raina! The drive to mid off has been stopped by a diving effort
full on middle and leg, and Pathan can't get bat to ball. Hits his pad as he attempts a leg-side flick
full on off, and comfortably driven off the front foot. Mid off cuts it off
full on off, and turning into his pads. Nudged off the front foot to the vacant mid-wicket region. Jaddu goes chasing again
full on middle, and he goes right across his stumps to try and sweep it square. Connects well, but only to short fine leg
angling into his pads, and clipped off his toes to the midwicket boundary. The man in the deep tries to cut the boundary, but that's a futile attempt. Off the bat's sweet spot this time.
short just outside off, and the ball zips just past Yusuf's face! Nice line from Shardul
full outside off, and Brathwaite takes a big stride forward to meet the ball on the full. Driven to mid off. Sunrisers' run-rate still under six
back of a length on off, and Brathwaite walks inside the line of the delivery and flicks it to the square-leg fielder
length ball just outside off. Angling into Brathwaite, and blocked off the back foot. Played to cover point
full outside off, and the batsman goes poking at it. Glanced down to third man
good length on off, and fended off the back foot. Sees the over out

chance of a run out! But MSD misses. Full on off, and tapped towards the leg side. But the ball's barely gone ten feet away and Carlos runs down the wicket. Yusuf tells him to race back - with MSD chasing behind it - but the direct-hit never came!
pacey! Drills this straight on middle stump, and Brathwaite defends it back to the bowler

leading edge back to Jadeja! Good length on middle, and looking to work it towards midwicket. He's through his shot too early, and the leading edge comes towards Yusuf, the non striker. But Jadeja scoots behind Yusuf and holds on to the offering. That's No. 5!
quicker delivery, on middle and angling down the leg. Whipped off his pads to deep backward square
full just outside off, and that's been driven off the front foot past cover. They walk across for the run

back of the hand again, but this length ball outside off can't be put away. Spotted it early, and tried to pull it towards cow corner, but the shot comes off the bat's toe end. Yusuf looks at his blade to see the damage
short again! And this time the square-leg umpire spreads his arms wide. Tried the slower ball, but it loops over Yusuf's head. Remember, he's a tall man
short! On the fourth-stump line outside off, but Yusuf chooses not to engage with it. Lets it go over his shoulder and through to MSD
almost a perfect yorker on off stump. Yusuf jams it off the front foot, and sends it back to Chahar
slower ball, but awry line. Going down the leg side, and Yusuf actually gloves it. Doesn't go to Dhoni straight though. On the bounce to the keeper
fourth-stump line, and rising onto Yusuf. Punched off the back foot to point on this occasion. Tight delivery
good length on off, and this time Pandey punches it off his back foot. Goes past the non-striker, and to the man at long on
low full toss on middle, and Pandey hits this straight to the only infielder on the leg side. Watson there, and he has a shy at the non-striker's stumps. Misses!
outside off this time, and Yusuf makes that extra room to cut it square. Can't get that perfect timing off his bat. Straight to cover point, and the batsman looks disappointed
good length on middle, and he leans back to pull it over the infield. Man at deep midwicket though
length ball on middle, and angling into Yusuf's body. Flicked off his hips to the vacant midwicket region. Forces Jadeja to go racing behind it
full on middle, and straightens after pitching. Fended back off the front foot
full on middle and leg, and comfortably worked off his pads to the square-leg region. They jog across
good length on off, and he comes walking down the wicket. Pushes with the bat's open face to cover point
wide yorker, squeezed through point
really full on off, 138ks, driven down to mid-off hanging back for one
Pathan gets on top of a short ball outside off and forces it away to the right of sweeper cover
Bravo hits the deck. New role for him? Short on off, spliced away to the right of the bowler
dug in short and outside off, no off-pace balls from Bravo today, Pathan evades it again
back of a length and floated down leg, leg slip still around, Pathan can't tickle it away. Leg-side wide
lifter on middle, keeps leg slip interested does Bravo, Pathan, however, ducks under this
straight ball on middle, played back to the bowler
tickled with the angle to short fine leg
full and darted in on middle, nudged to midwicket for one more
full and drifts in on off, eased down to long-off
full and arrowed in on middle, pushed up to mid-on
full and slides in on middle from around the wicket, tapped to cover
dug short and outside off, rides the bounce and guides it in the gap at point
bouncer outside off, Yusuf can't connect with the ramp

This is the left-hander's version of Williamson's dismissal. Another batsman has been strangled down the leg side. Dhoni dives to his right (yes, he dives) snaps it up. Back of a length and slanted down the leg side, Shakib now tickles it behind. Bravo brings out his RunDWorld Jig and celebrates
tucked off the pads to long leg, where Ngidi fumbles and gives away an extra run
full and sliding into the pads, clipped through square leg
full and just a shade outside off, driven to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, punched through the line to mid-off
slower short ball on off, Shakib delays his pull and hits it to deep square leg
back of a length and outside off, Shakib charges out and drills it so straight, it it hits the stumps at the other end. No deflection from Chahar
hip-high short ball on middle, Shakib rolls his wrists and pulls it away behind square, placed to the right of fine leg
Shakib leans back to this short ball outside off and chops it to point
good length on middle, defended back to the bowler
back of a length, on top of off, CSK's quicks keep hitting that hard length, jabbed back to Thakur
hip-high short ball on middle, swivels on the back foot and swats it away to long leg
shorter and on a fourth-stump line, opens the face and guides to point
back of a length and angling away outside off, Shakib throws his hands at the width, and cuts it fiercely between cover-point and backward point

Williamson has been strangled down the leg side. He throws his head back in despair. Thakur sets off on a celebratory sprint. Thakur now hits a back of a length and angles it down the leg side.Williamson looks to pull but can only tickle it behind for a straightforward catch. Gloved to Dhoni. What an unfortunate way to go. Big scalp for CSK
full and homing in on middle, tucked away through square leg for a couple of runs
back of a length and zips away in the corridor, Pandey hangs his bat out and is beaten on the outside edge by this near 140kph dart

Pace on the ball now. Ngidi dives forward, pockets a  low return catch, and lets out a big roar. Goswami continues to back away outside leg, Ngidi follows him and hits a hard length. Goswami is cramped and pulls weakly. He ends up flapping a low catch to Ngidi
another slower ball outside off, 116.7ks, Williamson spots the change-up and runs it down to third man
Goswami flits around the crease, Ngidi bowls a slower cutter on leg stump, dabbed to the leg side
Goswami skips away outside leg, gets the full length he was looking for. He manufactures width and belts it away to the cover boundary
back of a length and climbs over middle stump. Goswami backs away outside leg, has a mighty whoosh, and collects fresh air
slower ball outside off, 118.9ks, not sure if that was a knuckle ball. Williamson delays his push to cover
Goswami helps one to third man and gets off strike

Has Dhoni missed a run-out chance? He leaps, collects the throw from Harbhajan, has enough time to deflect it onto the stumps. Instead, he tries a slam dunk and lets off Goswami. This was full and straying into the pads, picked off through square leg. They take on Harbhajan, Dhoni, and get away. Had Dhoni nailed it, Goswami would have been out
this is regal from Kane Williamson. Just short of a good length and outside off, he leans back and cuts it away between square point and backward point
similar length and outside off, Goswami stays leg-side of the ball and jabs with an open face to deep third man
back of a length and shaping away outside off, Williamson allows the ball to come on and then rides it out to deep third man for one more
edged and flies away past the left of a diving Watson at first slip. Full and angling away outside off, Goswami flashes an outside edge and gets a fortunate four
Gowswami ventures outside leg, Ngidi hits a hard length and cramps him for room. Stabbed hastily into the off side
full and angling in at off stump, pat and run to Harbhajan hanging back at mid-off
pitched up and outside off, 142ks, Williamson presses forward and scoops a drive to mid-on
nip-backer from Ngidi, back of a length, starts outside off and nearly chops Williamson into half. Beats the inside edge and runs away to Dhoni
back of a length and slanting away outside off, punched away to deep third man
another attempted inswinger that finishes on the pads, flicked away again, this time fine on the leg side past the left of Dhoni for three successive boundaries
inswinger from Chahar, too full and finishes on the pads of Williamson. This leg-stump half-volley is delightfully flicked away behind square

Chahar goes wide of the crease, but this full ball holds its line outside off, Williamson leans into it and caresses a cover drive. There were four in the ring on the off side but Williamson still found the gap. That's how good he is
pitched up and swinging away outside off, Williamson presses forward and taps it quietly to cover
nice and full, angling in at off, then swinging away slightly, Williamson covers up in defence

Perfect start for CSK and Chahar! Back of a length and angling away outside off from over the stumps, Dhawan chases  it with a cut but is rooted to the crease as he throws his hands at the ball. He only ends up dragging it back onto the stumps via a thick inside edge. Chahar pumps his fist and celebrates. Dhawan bags a first-ball duck

a blockbuster finish! Mohit Sharma looks to double-bluff Dhoni, the man who mentored him through his early phases in this tournament. He bounces him. Dhoni knows it's coming. He's sitting on the back foot. He's ready - he sends the hook sailing over long leg
length ball on off stump and a solid block on the front foot because Dhoni now gets to finish the game
off the middle! It has happened. Raina gets behind a bouncer and expertly taps the hook past short fine leg
another one lands short but this time it'll go through the fielder as well. Raina is mastering these toe-end strokes. Length ball wide outside off and he throws his hands at it. Sweeper done for
just clears long-on this time! That's fifty. A slog right off the toe-end. Dropped short from Tye again, full swing from Raina again. Poor connection again
length ball on middle stump, swishes across the line and gets it between long-on and deep midwicket for the two

just clears deep midwicket. A new trend in the IPL, to keep your leg side boundary riders in a few yards. Raina picks the slower ball that's dug in short and drags it over that man who has to pedal backwards
yes he is! And he gets it too. Mohit bowls a length ball on middle stump, Dhoni swivels and swings this between deep square and deep midwicket

falls short of deep midwicket now. Raina has hit two boundaries in a peculiar innings. Can't middle them yet. Ends up slicing another attempted slog and it lobs before plonking in front of the fielder running in
nicely bowled. Inswinging yorker at middle stump. He steps out and jams this to mid-off
short ball at middle stump, under-edge trickles past the stumps as he looks to cut this forcefully

sliced to third man as he looks to pummel it over midwicket. Short ball slanted across him. Rajpoot gives his best there, running in. Has to stop it on the bounce after putting in the dive. Couldn't make it
bouncer's dug in too short. Climbs over head-height as he ducks under this
good length on middle stump, tapped to long-on on the up
short of a length outside off, chopped straight to short third man
dropped short outside off. Gets behind it and slaps it away past point. Axar puts in a slide to his left at sweeper cover and keeps it in play
arm ball on the pads, shovelled through midwicket off the back foot
flat and full on middle stump, taps it to long-on off the front foot
short of a length on off stump, tapped to cover's left off the back foot

end of Chahar's adventure. And what a good one it's been for him. Showed two gears and the team will be very happy with him. It's a carrom ball floating away from him outside off. He slogs and gets it high in the off side. Easy catch in the infield
length ball on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket's right
length ball on off stump, swings across the line and gets an inside edge into the fine leg region
short ball outside off, chopped straight to point who misfieldsl
length ball in at leg stump, flicked uppishly to long-on

short_text: Axar Patel to Chahar, SIX runs
long_text: clears the straight boundary! Chahar is doing this too easily now! Backs away, exposes the stump and swings from under this length ball skidding into him. It's flat and clears the fence
full on leg stump, flicked to long-on
length on middle stump, flicked to long-on's right
short and wide and he chops it over cover! Kings XI need to get six wickets and concede nothing to qualify. Chahar does it with simplicity
tossed up at off stump, driven to long-on
full outside off, flicks to long-on off the front foot
short and very wide outside off. Looks to cut and misses
and another! Tossed up outside off and he plants the front leg forward to get to the pitch and clobber this over long-off
there it is. Length ball on middle stump, gets down, gets under it, sweeps it high over deep square
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square

short_text: Axar Patel to Chahar, no run
long_text: length ball outside off, inside edge onto pad as he looks to heave into the leg side again
well done Mohit. Sprints to his left at deep mdiwicket and stops it on the bounce to his left going for the catch. A slog sweep from Chahar, picked up from outside off stump

short_text: Axar Patel to Chahar, no run
long_text: short ball just outside off, chopped straight to point
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length ball on middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket off the front foot
short of a length outside off, punched to point's left off the back foot
slider in at a length on middle stump, flicked straight to midwicket
good length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
arm ball in at leg stump, tapped to midwicket from the crease
carrom ball at a length on middle stump, tapped through square leg off the back foot
short of a length and in at off stump, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
slower ball outside off, opens the face and drives to sweeper's left
overpitched on middle stump, driven down to long-on
full toss outside off, looks to drive through cover. Gets a thick inside edge towards long-on
full on middle stump, flicked to long-on
short of a length outside off, jabs at it, gets a thick outside edge to third man
bouncer at leg stump. Gets under it and slices uppishly towards deep square
knuckle ball dug in short and down leg side. He can't get bat on the pull
good length around off, some spin into him, punched wide of long-on and they sprint back for the second
back of a length on middle, punched off the backfoot to long-on
flat non-turning ball, just back of a length, flicked to midwicket
full on leg, turned away to deep backward square leg
full and sliding into leg, clipped to short fine leg

gets down for another big slog. Not full enough and raps the pad of Harbhajan. He's hanging around contemplating a review but ends up walking away. Comes on straight from a length and pins him in front of middle and leg
pitched up around off, hammered down to long-on
shuffles across to a length ball and flicks to deep backward square leg
goes for a big slog and gets an inside edge towards fine leg
full, flicked behind square
full, skewed into the off side off the leading edge
flat fuller one, flicked behind square
length outside off, opens the face and steers to deep backward point
short of a length, angled across a set of stumps outside off, Raina shuffles across and flicks it into the on side
full on middle, clipped to deep midwicket
short of good length, Raina shuffles across and whips it to deep midwicket
short, angled across too much as it drifts out of Raina's reach
short of a length outside off, gets on top of it and drops it in front of point for one
full toss that drifts down the leg side, Harbhajan swings and makes no contact
short of a length, Raina shuffles across and tucks to square leg

short_text: Axar Patel to Harbhajan, no run
long_text: short around off, swings early and the ball finds the back of the bat as it goes behind the stumps

short_text: Axar Patel to Harbhajan, no run
long_text: again shuffles across early and swings big and misses outside off

short_text: Axar Patel to Harbhajan, FOUR runs
long_text: walks across and then tries to slog it out of here but gets an underedge that gets past the keeper. Through his legs

short_text: Axar Patel to Harbhajan, no run
long_text: shortish but not much room, forces a cut and finds point
full on middle, flicked with the turn to deep square leg

short_text: Axar Patel to Raina, no run
long_text: length, spinning in, tucked to short fine leg
walks across to a wide one and lets it go. But it's deemed fine
short outside off, jumps on his toes and knocks it back to the bowler
oh, he's crunched that. Bang off the middle. Superb connection. A wide length ball, clears the front foot and swings clean over extra cover
gets the front foot out of the way and swings and misses at a length ball outside off

short ball, swings for a pull and misses as the ball gets over the bat. Harbhajan asks if it isn't the second bouncer and then the umpire calls it a no-ball. He had walked down the ground too. Rajpoot can't be any less amused
short ball, too much pace and bounce outside off, Harbhajan tries to ramp it over but can't get on top of it
almost strangled down the leg side. Harbhajan moves across and tries a flick and the ball goes over leg stump. Barely! Geez, what's happening here!
full toss on middle stump. Mistimed slog straight to square leg
finds the point boundary! Length ball outside off, gets the front foot out of the way and slices it over point
wild heave is mistimed. It trickles out to mid-on. A length ball outside off

he's early run out! Why is Harbhajan out there?! Calls for a run he can't make and is not even stretching to make the striker's end. Raina anxiously dabs another length ball to square leg and the fielder can't hit the stumps
full ball on off stump, tapped from the crease into the covers. Some late swing there
length ball in the corridor, Raina nervously defends off the inside edge

dropped! Finch has dived in front of Gayle from second slip and put one down! Rahul chucks the ball away in frustration. CSK were this close to being in a disastrous position. Rajpoot, back of a length outside off. Harbhajan jabs at it with feet rooted to the crease. That was going straight to Gayle.
back of a length outswinger outside off. Walks down the pitch and taps it into the leg side

got him! Ankit Rajpoot does not like simple endings! He's keeping Kings XI alive. A length ball that nips away marginally to beat a very nervous-looking forward defence from Billings - he's inside the line. The top of off stump is tonked and suddenly CSK will feel the nerves!

Gayle unsure at first slip if he's taken this. Faf driving on the up against an outswinger gets a thick edge. Soft signal is out. Gayle went weirdly at this - with a reverse cup with his right hand and a normal catching position with his other hand! Goes low to his left and it looks like he's managed it no conclusive evidence to overturn this. Faf is gone! Superb bowling finally rewarded.

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, no run
long_text: short of a length, curving away. Faf with the waft. Beaten

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, no run
long_text: drives straight to cover. Nicely to the pitch of this full outswinger outside off
well done Tiwary. Leaps to his right and saves four. Raina leans in nicely for this cover drive on the up but can't get it past him
length ball swinging away outside off. Left alone
short ball down leg side. Raina leaping to get out of the way and stabbing at it. Beaten
bouncer. Down leg side.
boom! Steps out and pumps him straight! At a length on off stump again and he meets this outside leg to drill past his partner
slapped away. Too short from Tye. Sits up outside off stump and it's an easy put away. Aerial, over point
good length, shaping into the corridor. Defended into the leg side off the inside half of the bat
short ball slanted across off stump. Cut into the turf, on the bounce to point

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, FOUR runs
long_text: shot. Won't allow you to bowl to me, says Faf. Gets down the pitch to cut out the swing and lifts one over the off-side infield

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, no run
long_text: length ball swinging away, wide outside off. Left alone

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, FOUR runs
long_text: outside edge past second slip! Scythes at another one outside off, goes fully at it. No position at all to execute that perfectly and it flies quickly to the third man boundary

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, no run
long_text: leading edge to mid-off. Great bowling, this. Outswinger from middle stump. Faf's bat face is closed too quickly and this ends up at mid-off

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, no run
long_text: beaten. Short of a length outswinger wide outside off. Slashes at it but it skids through from under
big inswinger onto the pads. Raina falls over into the off side and glances uppishly towards fine leg

short_text: Sharma to du Plessis, FOUR runs
long_text: past Mohit's outstretched hand! Faf jabbing nervously from the crease at this length ball. It doesn't have too much movement on it and that's probably what's deceived him a touch. Manages to find four from between mid-off and the bowler

short_text: Sharma to du Plessis, no run
long_text: good length outside off, defended solidly on the front foot
short of a length at leg stump, leaps to get on top of it and nudges through square leg
length ball just outside off. Defended into the covers from the crease
got him! The new ball is talking, the new ball as got CSK's best batsman of the season! Mohit hits a length just outside off, Rayudu jabs at it and gets an edge through to Rahul
close. Rayudu allows this to come very close to him, with no forward press. It's a length ball and he gets it onto pad off the inside edge

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, no run
long_text: and again. Swing movement and bounce. Faf at it again away from the body, can't get a touch

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, no run
long_text: squares him up. Shaping away from off stump and then jagging away with bounce off the pitch to beat him as he looks to defend on the back foot

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, no run
long_text: good length outswinger wide outside off, left alone
short of a length on leg stump, nudged to midwicket with soft hands

short_text: Rajpoot to du Plessis, no run
long_text: lovely ball. Length ball shaping away outside off, drawing the bat away from the body before swinging past it
good length outswinger at off stump. Leans in and jabs with soft hands to get it down to third man off the front foot

bowled out. Slower short ball at off stump, makes room and slices one to long-on where Faf is calm and very still a centimetre in front of the boundary. Graceful landing and that's out, confirmed by the replays
full ball on the stumps, makes room and drills it to sweeper cover
yorker outside off, has a heave at it again, thick outside edge to third man
nice juicy length ball outside off, nice, clean, aimless swing somewhere in the middle stump vicinity. Beaten
slower ball at a length on leg stump, tapped into the midwicket region off the back foot

and then he msicues one to find mid-off. Nair is livid with himself. Seems to have been in the right place once again. A yorker and he's leg-side of it, trying to go inside-out between extra cover and mid-off. Gets it right off the toe to that fielder and whacks the ground with his bat
fifty! And once again, he knows what's coming because he's made it so! The short ball, obviously. Steps out and swats it over wide long-on

he's in full control. Once again, puts the pressure with one six and makes the bowler bowl exactly what he wants the next ball. Bravo's slower ball is anticipated - he's going down on his knee very early outside off. When it arrives, he scoops him over fine leg
hello! Karun Nair with an outrageous reverse pick-up from outside leg stump. Full and fired down leg side. He skips quickly into stance and taps this over backward point
short of a length outside off, nudges it straight to point on the up
length ball on middle stump, punched to long-on on the up
short of a length outside off, opens the face and gets it to point's right
length ball on off stump, defended into the covers

chips the next one straight to mid-off. Ngidi with the Heavy BallTM  in the corridor again. Tye looking to jab at it well in front of the body, can only chip it harmlessly over the bowler. 4 for 8 for Ngidi. Kings XI's season closing rapidly
a vicious yorker first up. Does fantastically to dig this out to mid-off

a review this time. Ngidi must have charming eyes. Dhoni says he heard nothing but takes the review anyway. But Ngidi is right! Ashwin is looking to chop this length ball down to third man and he's got a very very thin edge on this! Ashwin is gone! What a review. Some climb in in the corridor from a length, very fast, and just enough for Ashwin
short ball down leg side. He looks to tickle it fine. Ngidi appeals. Umpire says wide. No review.

lazy attempt from Dhoni and that's a missed chance. Nair backs away too much and is lunging to try and play a square drive. Gets a thick edge that flies to Dhoni's right and he only gets an obligatory right hand out at this, feet barely moving
knuckle ball goes woefully wrong It's very wide
induces the bouncer by faking a shuffle. Quickly jumps back and gets inside the line to ramp this comfortably over deep square leg
goes over extra cover. New favourite shot for Nair. Exposes the stumps and gets an overpitched ball again that he can open the face against as he goes aerially. Beats BIllings to his right

give that man a raise! Sam Billings takes a stunner! A graceful leap forward after a short sprint in from a straight-ish deep square leg position and a tumble to kill the momentum without letting the elbow hit the floor - top class athleticism. Axar slices the short ball and it's dipping fast
misfield at mid-off. Length ball just outside off, mistimed, slic-ey punch on the up from Axar. Chahar gets down very slowly and allows it to pass
length ball on leg stump, backs away and gets followed down leg side. Looks to flick it uppishly but can't get bat on it
pushed through at off stump, punched to long-off
length ball on off, punched to long-off

short_text: Jadeja to Axar Patel, SIX runs
long_text: oh well played. Jadeja is firing it in to make sure they don't get a swing on the front foot. So he goes on the back foot and uses that pace to slap it wide of long-off. Stunning hit
short of a length and in at leg stump. Backs away and slices to sweeper cover. Jadeja pushing em in fast
length ball at leg stump, pulled to deep midwicket from the crease
length ball into leg stump, punched to long-on off the front foot
full ball on leg stump, backs away and flicks to long-on
yorker on leg stump, clips it to deep midwicket
short of a length outside off, dabbed to third man
loops slower ball on leg stump. Flicked to deep square leg
short of a length outside off, chopped to third man
glorious shot. Exposes the stumps and lofts it wide of long-off with a clean, straight bat. It's overpitched on off stump and just what Nair needs to get this off the middle

short_text: Jadeja to Axar Patel, no run
long_text: short of a length on off stump, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
backs away, gets followed. Shovels it to deep backward square
length on leg stump, tickled to fine leg off the thigh guard
length ball on the stumps, backs away and punches to long-off
his go-to shot clears Ngidi at deep backward square. Nair likes to sweep. Jadeja has ample pace for that and despite getting too far under this and getting it off the toe-end, he clears the man
short of a length slider outside off, chopped straight to point

short_text: Bravo to Axar Patel, no run
long_text: length ball on middle stump, punched back to the bowler on the up

short_text: Bravo to Axar Patel, no run
long_text: beaten on the inside edge. Plays down the wrong line at this. It's in the corridor and he's poking well wide from that. Bravo thinks there's an edge but Dhoni's in no mood
good length on middle stump, punched on the up to long-on
length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket from the crease
full ball outside off, a nice-looking straight drive to long-off

bowled him! Beauty from Bravo. The perfect yorker. Miller shuffles and comes back in line but it's all too much because he won't be able to keep this yorker from hitting off. Right on the crease and crash. Two set batsmen gone in six balls.

length ball on leg stump, punched to deep midwicket off the back foot and then calls for a suicidal second run. Karun rightly sends him back and he has to dive in the end. Jadeja misses the stumps after collecting the throw. Might have just made it
arm ball at a length, skidding into the stumps. Pushed into the off side from the crease
short of a length just outside off, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
length ball on leg stump, deflected into the leg side as he looks to flick off the front foot
length ball on middle stump, leans in and clips it through the open midwicket region with soft hands

there's a sound as Dhoni takes this. Yeah he's out. No one appeals. But Tiwary and Dhoni both no he's got an edge on this attempted slog sweep. Once again, before the review can be taken, a batsman walks off. Routine length ball outside off and a very tame, sober sequence of play breaks the partnership. Good innings from Tiwary
low full toss wide outside off, steps out and completely misses the slash outside off
something in the pitch today if you dig it short. Another top edge as Miller is late on the pull. Lands well in front of fine leg
length ball on middle stump, shuffles and flicks straight to long leg
length ball just outside off, jabbed straight to extra cover on the up
short ball just outside off. Too late on the pull, ends up slicing it to long-on
short of a length outside off, back-foot square drive is stopped by Rayudu who dives to his right at point
short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
top edge as he looks to hook. Flies over Dhoni. Sharp short one from Bravo just outside off and he's too late on the shot
loopy slower ball on leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket to pinch a single

leg stump length ball. Tickled fine off the thigh guard. Dhoni fields and the batsman is caught staring at him as his partner calls through for a run and gets halfway down the pitch with no response. All safe in the end
full ball outside off, plants the front leg across into the off side and looks to flick. Gets it off the leading edge to long-off
short of a length just outside off, slanted across the left-hander who slices it to third man's left
tapped to sweeper cover

length on off, punched to mid-off for a quick single. He throws at the bowler's end and misses. They take the overthrow. Then Bravo at square leg throws to Dhoni who lets it go through his legs and they take another overthrow
short and climbing into him without room, fails to get on top of it as he barely keeps it out
full, tails away down the leg side
good length around off, plays late with an open face to point. Denies Miller a single late but he manages to make it back
full, tries to heave it over but skews it off the inside part of the bat. But it's through the gap backward of square leg
pacy length ball at 140.3 kmph on middle, blocked back
tries to sweep this non-turner from outside off and gets an inside edge that barely missesthe stumps
full and straight, worked off the inside of the bat to midwicket
a bit of spin from a good length, shuffles across and punches to long-on
just over a leaping Jadeja at long-on. Tiwary comes down the track and hoicks this one after getting right to the pitch
good length and straighter, Tiwary bunts it back
short and wide, Tiwary rocks back and cuts very late to knock it through backward point
swings at the sight of width, there's lot of room, so there was the chance that he may find the toe-end but he's done well to deposit it over long-off
another bouncer, Miller walks across and bends, and as its the second bouncer of the over, it's a no-ball
swipes across the line to one that's angled across and misses
bouncer that goes well over Miller who doesn't even duck
shuffles across to a length ball and punches forcefully to mid-on who dives to his right and stops it
length on off, dropped to cover for a quick one
good length, late away movement, opens up Tiwary who does well to defend it really late
shortish outside off, angled in from wide of the crease, jumps and taps it out to mid-on
length outside off, gets an inside edge to the pad down the pitch. Another quick one
length outside off, dropped in front of extra cover for a quick single
length, angled across around off, punched to mid-off who misfields and allows a single
full outside off, reaches out and carves through the left of point
angles in a short of a length delivery and it's gently turned away through square leg
full and holding its line outside off, big swing and a miss
length ball around off, nips away slightly and finds an outside edge to third man
short outside off, gets up on his toes and pats it into the ground through backward point
short of a length on middle and leg, jumps and turns it away to the leg side
full on leg stump, flicked off the pads through square leg
short of a length, angled across, blocked to point
full on middle and leg, clipped to mid-on for a very tight single

old wounds opened up for Rahul. Remember the Tests in Sri Lanka when he lost his stumps shouldering arms? It's happened again. A length ball that nips in sharply from outside off. Error in judgement costs Rahul
good length outside off, subtle shape away, rips past the outside edge

good length ball that nips in, comes forward and blocks and the ball goes off the inside of the at to mid-on. Tiwary is halfway down eager to get off the mark but is sent back. The throw misses the stumps and three fielders fall over it and they end up getting it anyway. Comedy of errors
short of good length, angled in, blocked
feels for this short of a length delivery outside off and gets beaten on the outside edge
length ball that nips in, blocked from the crease
full toss that swings in and finds the inside edge behind the stumps

what a delivery! A brute from Chahar. Shortish, pushes him right back and then gets it to rip away off the deck to square up Finch who gets an outside edge to Suresh Raina who snaffles a sharp catch at first slip with the ball rushing onto him
just back of a length, angled in, flicked to deep square leg
length ball, angled in, tries to flick and wears it on the pad instead
full and angling in, raps the pad and heading down leg, as the angle clearly suggests
length ball with a bit of nip away, Finch punches off the backfoot between cover and point diving to his right
short ball outside off, rising steeply and running past the bat as he fishes for it
short of a length on middle stump, defended into the leg side off the inside edge
beaten and Dhoni can't collect it cleanly. Length ball outside off, he slashes hard at it as it swings in the air after pitching. Keeps drifting away from Dhoni who parries it to third man
short of a length ball banged into the corridor, climbing into Finch's body as he looks to defend on the back foot. Gets it off the inside edge into the leg side

big appeal turned down, but Gayle walks off! Short ball on the hips. A tentative nudge from Gayle, trying to tickle it fine. He gets a glove on it and Dhoni takes it down leg side. Walks off before Dhoni - who looked very convinced - can think of a review
beaten. Ngidi gets some sharp climb across the corridor as Gayle gets stuck in the crease, fishing away from the body
length ball outside off, slices it straight to point on the up
short ball well down leg side. Can't get bat on the pull
here we go! KL Rahul celebrates immeidately. Full outswinger outside off and he gets close to it, head above the ball, to squeeze this through cover
good length with some shape away in the corridor. Leans in and guides the forward defence to point
short of a length just outside off, drops it behind point with soft hands
short of a length on leg stump, flicked late, very fine to Harbhajan's right at long leg
length ball hooping away in the corridor, defended solidly into the covers

it's all over! Mumbai are eliminated from IPL 2018. A slower ball outside off from Harshal and Bumrah just chips a catch to long-on. Boult takes the catch. Glum, glum faces in the Mumbai dugout as their campaign ends in the final hurdle before the playoffs.

and taken! That was a very brave delivery from Harshal and he gets away with it. A short and slow wide delivery outside off. Cutting had walked across, looking to drag the swat over midwicket but because he has to reach out for it so much, he's not in control of the stroke. He picks out deep midwicket. No relay catch this time. A terrific cameo from Cutting though.

a short delivery down leg and Cutting smashes that for SIX. That's the worst ball you can bowl. Short and slow down leg and Cutting just helps it along over short fine leg for six. WOW. Mumbai still in this.
he misses a full toss. A full toss on off that is very quick, Markande misses it and the ball knocks off stump
well bowled. A wide yorker ends up as a low and wide full toss, sliced to deep backward point for one.
a full toss outside off is badly hit to deep cover for a couple. Cutting wanted to hit that over long-off but the ball skewed away.

Shaw misses the stumps at the batsman's end, with Cutting not even in the picture. A full delivery is driven to short cover. Shaw takes aim and throws the ball wide. Boult cannot believe it. Cutting back on strike. Pant made the attempt to come front and gather, but fell over while collecting. He needs some time to gather himself.
not easy for a No. 9. A good length delivery on middle, goes over the stump after Markande misses a dab.
excellently bowled. A wide yorker outside off, jammed to long-off.
good length outside off, an open-faced dab to third man. Cutting refuses the single.
a nice low full toss outside off, driven to long-on for a run
the change in length works. A short offcutter outside off, beats Cutting's pull.
hang on to your hats! This ain't done just yet. Full and straight, an offcutter, he picks it and drills the ball over his partner's head. Fierce power over Markande, through long-on

that's maaaaaassive! Wheeee. Big hit from Cutting. Now there is time to take it easy too. Full and straight, right in the slot for Cutting, who stays upright and then lofts the ball over long-on. Lovely hit
gets it past short fine leg for four. Some claps in the Mumbai dugout. A slower ball down leg, flicked away past short fine leg. Well played.
a low full toss down leg, worked down to short fine leg. He picks up and fires, but misses at the batsman's end. Out if he hit
picks that and launched over long-on. A slower ball outside off, Cutting waits and waits before heaving that over midwicket
falls short of Harshal Patel! A slower ball down leg, flicked away in the air towards deep backward square leg. He runs to his right but can't quite get there
a slower ball outside off, a big swing and miss from Cutting.
good length down leg, off the pad down towards leg gully.
full outside off, driven to long-off for a run
googly down leg, worked to deep midwicket for a couple. 3 for 36 for Lamichhane
the googly on leg, 88 kph. Markande doesn't read that and pats the ball back to the bowler
very full outside off, driven to cover. Mumbai going nowhere.
flat on off, defended into the off side.
drifts down leg, was there some pad or thigh pad on that? The umpire calls it a wide
flat outside off, chopped to point for a run
flat and straight, pushed out towards cover
short and wide, carved to backward point

is that Mumbai done? Mishra and Iyer embrace! Lovely bowling from Mishra, tossed that up well outside off. Hardik Pandya looks to go for the big slog down the ground but it was wider outside off so he isn't quite in control of that. The ball takes the leading edge and lobs to backward point. Mumbai on the brink of elimination.
full delivery outside off, driven to cover
a googly outside off, patted towards cover for one
looking for the fine paddle sweep, was very slow from Mishra, the ball climbs past the paddle sweep
flat on middle and leg, pushed towards cover.
a short delivery on leg, Pandya walks across and looks to flick the ball fine, but fails to make contact. Over leg stump that was.

and again! Maxwell and Boult combine for another relay catch! A full delivery around off, Rohit stays in his crease and lofts the ball towards long-on. Maxwell runs to his left again takes a good catch again and throws the ball back to Boult again, who walks in from long-off. Maxwell has a complaint about the ease of Boult's catches with him doing all the hard work.

short_text: Patel to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: full and straight, patted back towards mid-on
good stop by Pant! Harshal drifts well down leg for a wide. Pant gets across to his left and stops four extras
131 kph, quick outside off, a good length delivery, creeps under Hardik's bat
full outside off, flicked to long-on for a run
a slower ball outside off, worked in the gap for two, at midwicket
poor delivery. Drifts down leg and Hardik flicks the ball very fine, past backward square leg for four.
full and wide outside off, driven to deep cover.

overthrows! Four? Short and wide outside off, hit to Iyer at cover, who takes aim and throws at the non-striker's end. The backing-up from deep midwicket isn't very good, Harshal runs around from square leg and attempts to keep the ball in the field of play, fails to do so. The umpire calls five overthrows, shouldn't it be four overthrows? That's absurd.
slower ball down leg, worked to deep midwicket

short_text: Boult to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs
long_text: the wide yorker outside off, Rohit opens the bat face and guides the ball through backward point for four.
a slower, very wide delivery outside off is called
