just over cover and four more. Another very vital Narine cameo. Back of a length on middle, Narine clears his front leg and chips the ball over the fielder
a slower ball is in Narine's wheelhouse. Narine clears his front leg and heaves the ball away for long-on. Massive timing.
a short and wide delivery outside off, maybe fifth-stump channel so not too wide. Narine is beaten for bounce as he looks to cut.
lovely shot. Waits for that flight to dip and not turn. Uthappa then swats the sweep over long-on with sublime timing, it was close to a cross bat but the power and timing was excellent.
a low full toss outside off, driven away to mid-off for a run
105 kph, flat outside off, swept down to long-on again.
the drifter! Full on middle, keeps coming in, takes the inside edge of a big heave, away towards square leg
looking for the big sweep, flat around off, he improvises a push to long-on
a low full toss outside off, driven to mid-off
a low full toss on middle, pushed to mid-on

de Villiers takes Lynn! A nice catch. A short, wide delivery outside off. Lynn is too far away from the ball to make adequate contact. All he can do is chip the ball away over cover. But there is enough airtime for AB to run to his left and backwards, his eyes peeled on the ball right through its trajectory and completes the play. Good bowling from Woakes too to bowl that wider
a thick inside edge for four. Full and wide outside off, the ball seams back in. Misses the stumps and misses the fine leg fielder.
beaten again. Short and wide outside off, the ball bounces a touch extra too and goes over the bat of Lynn.
full and wide outside off, the ball swinging away. The ball goes past Lynn's hard drive. There won't be many easy catches with this form of batting.
just short of the bowler? Did it carry? Full outside off, driven back to the bowler. Woakes dives low in front, the ball goes through.
drifts down leg, worked away to short fine leg for a run.
the flipper. Lynn does not mistake the flipper for a short delivery, blocked back.
some flight on middle and leg, pushed to mid-off with the spin
flat outside off, pushed to cover for one. Sensible from Narine, batting like a batsman.
Narine gets low and sweeps Chahal for six through midwicket with more power. This is spin into Narine's arc. Right in the slot.
Narine starts with a sweep that goes over the bowler's head, immense power. A flat-batted smash.

a nice slower ball and Russell will take the catch! Two wickets in two balls to finish the over. Woakes is through the shot too early, the ball takes the lower half of the bat and lobs to cover. Russell runs back and takes a good catch.

taken on the deep sweeper cover boundary. Full and wide, Mandeep slices the ball off the outside half to the fielder. Just a little more power and that would have been another six. A very tidy cameo from Mandeep, the impetus is now there.
indeed, yes, a wide yorker outside off. Jammed back to the bowler. Vinay hurls a throw back to Mandeep in utter frustration.
six more! Back of a length around off, Mandeep clears his front leg and pulls easily over midwicket. Right in the slot. That's poor end-overs bowling.
four more. A low full toss down leg, Mandeep helps himself to four more runs with a neat flick over short fine leg. Can't bowl a full toss at this stage.
full on middle and leg, Mandeep clears his front leg and goes boom, way over long-on for six. Shot.
falls short of fine leg. A short delivery down leg, pulled away with bad timing to short fine leg.
back of a length outside off again, carved away to deep backward point. Just one. Losing all momentum.
beaten for pace! Back of a length on off, the angle and the pace is too good for Woakes as the ball creeps between bat and pad.
full and wide outside off, Woakes opens the bat face and carves the ball through point for four. Sensational ball-striking, knew his area, didn't overhit.
back of a length around off, the ball beats the bat as Woakes looks to defend.

taken at long-on! Sarfraz picks out the fielder. That was a stumbling, stalling innings. Full outside off, Sarfraz mis-times a lofted drive down the throat of long-on. Kohli isn't happy Sarfraz didn't go through with the shot.
big appeal from Dinesh Karthik! Back of a length around middle and leg, Sarfraz looks to reverse-paddle the ball, the ball hits Sarfraz a little high also, on the front thigh. KKR don't review.
another carrom ball outside off, driven to deep cover for a run
fine and four. Another poor delivery, strays down leg, just nudged down to the fine leg boundary. Vital runs these.
a sweep to deep midwicket. A carrom ball, he doesn't even bother reading it, just cross bat.
the swerve of a carrom ball outside off, chopped to cover
a poor ball, short and down leg, Mandeep helps it along to the fine leg boundary. Errant line, easy put-away
again late on the shot. Back of a length on middle, pulled away towards long-on, but on the bounce to the fielder.
good length around off, defended into the off side for a run.
superb fielding from Rinku. A short delivery around middle and leg, pulled away with bad timing towards long-on, who runs to his right and saves two
he's so late on the shot. Back of a length outside off, Sarfraz is not close to the ball as he looks to cut
full and wide outside off, the ball coming in. Guided to backward point. Lots of dots.
full and wide outside off, carved off the open face to third man
full on middle and leg, and Mandeep comfortably turns it off his toes to deep backward square. Time-out once again.
short on off but Sarfraz misses the pull. Bunted to midwicket off the bat's toe end
slower ball just outside off, chopped off the back foot to third man
yorker on middle stump! Sarfraz does well to dig it back straight. Russell tries to get his fingertips to it, and manages to slow the ball down. They scamper across for the run anyway
full ball, and that's been driven past Russell to long on. They walk across for the run

good length just outside off, pokes at it and taps it to point. Misfield at point makes the batsman contemplate the run. Eventually chooses to come back, but would've been out if the throw was a direct-hit
tossed up full outside off, fended back towards the non-striker, and Rana's dive stops the ball. A terrific over for KKR comes to an end
half-tracker on off stump, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket. Played from the back foot
swept fine, and it trickles away for a boundary. Full on leg stump, and Mandeep shuffles across to the off side and paddles this to the leg side. Deep backward square loses the chase

yorked! And he's on a hat-trick. It's a full ball on Kohli's toes, and he can't dig it out. He misses the defense and the ball crashes into middle stump. Rana, you beauty! Takes two in two and KKR are right back in it once again

skied! And taken at long on. Another short ball on off, but AB wants to send that into the Ganges river. Tried to muscle this over the leg side, but it's been top edged. Johnson calls for the catch early and takes a swirler. The part-timer has broken the partnership
half-tracker on off, and that's been pulled over deep midwicket! Just goes deep into his crease and launches this onto the leg side
good length just outside off, AB tries a big leg-side heave but can't connect well. Comes off his bat's toe end, and trickles down to long on. He'll keep strike
goes short! Pitches on off and jags away from AB. Tries to pull, but he's nowhere near the ball. Through to Karthik from near his face
good length just outside off, drags his leg-side slog to cow corner this time. They walk across for the single
yorker on off, but manages to squeeze this away to deep midwicket. Late tail into his toes, but well negated by AB
full just outside off, the drive's not well connected as it's hit to cover
goes short first up. Wide outside off, and chopped on to point. Mis-hit first up
the googly down leg, nudged to short fine leg.
overpitched googly on middle and off, drilled to long-on
just over midwicket. That's bottom hand, all over. Comes running down and chips the ball into that area. The timing is so good that it clears Johnson, running around.
looking for another big hit but can't connect, hit away with bad timing to midwicket
don't think he read that googly, around off, a thick inside edge to short fine leg.
some flight down leg, flicked away to deep midwicket

superb delivery from Johnson. AB premeditated the full delivery so he went across, looking to chip the ball over fine leg. But it's a sharp bouncer aimed at the wide tramline, which means it's extremely well directed.
a slower offcutter on middle, defended to cover. A very good comeback from Johnson
on middle and leg, defended to cover. Finally, a breath

Johnson, who? This is tremendous batting. A slower offcutter, AB picks it so early and like he does off the last ball, knows which shot he's going to play, a lofted drive over mid-off with soooo much ease
goes short does Johnson. On middle and leg, and de Villiers nails his pull nicely into the gap towards backward square leg. He picks the areas to score earlier than any other batsmen I've seen

under-edged to the keeper? Did it hit the stump? Given out. Back of a length outside off, AB looks to cut the ball down to third man but the ball clips the top of the front pad. That was the big noise. The ball was close to the bat also, but UltraEdge says just pad, not bat. They will have to check for the lbw also. Impact says outside off stump so AB will continue on

flat on middle and off, nudged into the gap at midwicket for a couple. Sensational running, these two make running two look so easy, the fitness these two have is extremely rare to emulate in cricket.
it was his slowest start in T20s (11 off 20), but he breaks his stalling momentum with a lovely chip over cover for four.
gives himself lots of room. Narine goes the other way, and AB reaches out for it, taps to cover
backs away, and Narine follows him. The carrom ball, de Villiers stays low and sweeps over backward square leg. This is one of the best T20 bowlers
short and turning in, AB misses a flick, struck on the pad
shortish and wide outside off, chopped to short third man.

there is no one better in cricket at the 1-2. If one is full, he expects the next one short. He did that to Rashid Khan, a bowler that has owned T20s recently. He's done that to Kuldeep, knows that Kuldeep will be slow and full. So he runs down and drills a drive right back. What batting. Awesome
picks the googly and then lets his hands do the rest. A wide googly, a ball that Kuldeep has owned recently. Lofted so easily over cover
flat around off, pushed to long-on for one more.
some flight on middle again. AB is waiting to read the ball off the pitch, does and pushes to long-on
a googly on middle, waits for the ball to come to him before turning the ball fine to short third man
slow on middle and off, worked away to deep midwicket for a run
so easy for AB. Short and wide outside off, cut away towards cover who half-stops it. AB wants two but Kohli thinks maybe now now.
short and wide, the carrom ball, cut away to long-off. Think Kohli is just struggling a touch for timing.
another dot to Kohli, flat down leg. Kohli misses a flick, struck on the pad.
another swervy delivery outside off, AB opens his season with a neat drive to deep cover

gone through McCullum! A short offbreak, McCullum picks the length early, goes back and looks to hit that over midwicket but he was too early through the shot. The ball goes on and hits middle and off stump.
full down leg, 87 kph, blocked
good change in length, the bouncer and well directed too. Short down leg. Kohli is late on the pull, it just about misses the glove on the way to the keeper.
on a length, around off, chopped away towards point. Kohli and McCullum almost collide, other than that, an easy run.
he's clobbered that with immense power. Runs down, gets close enough to Johnson's offcutter and then smashes the ball over mid-off. Muscular hit.
134 kph, back of a length outside off, carved away towards point again.
just erred a touch in line and that's in McCullum's wheelhouse. Full and wide, McCullum transfers his weight late and drills the drive through cover for four.
back of a length from around the wicket, dabbed away towards backward point.
the floaty swervy delivery outside off, Kohli yorks himself as he defends.
94 kph, carved away to point for nothing. Lots of dots in the last 10 or so balls.
overpitched outside off, pushed away to long-off for a run. These two very happy with playing Narine out.
short around middle and leg, pulled over midwicket for a run. The timing there was horrible.
flat and straight, a thick inside edge into the ground
starts with a swervy away carrom ball that is fiercely struck to point
comes down, meets the ball before it pitches and cleanly chips the ball over long-on to round off a successful Powerplay for RCB. Calculated risks, and he's still there. Well played
92 kph, flat outside off, pushed with soft hands towards cover for a run
looking for the late cut but fails to connect. Short and wide outside off, Kohli misses his dab
they'll get one, short and wide, chopped away towards point. The ball beats the fielder running in.
excellently bowled, fired that in around off, defended back. Five dot balls in a row
overpitched outside off, McCullum backs away and jams an attempted drive into the ground.
three dots to end the over, well bowled. Flat on middle and leg, driven back towards the bowler. Kohli happy to play him out too.
wider outside off, flat too, pushed to mid-off from the crease
another wrong 'un around middle and leg, driven to mid-off
another googly on middle and leg, nudged to deep midwicket for one. Clever from McCullum.
flat outside off, McCullum misses a hard sweep and the ball just misses off stump. But Karthik whips off the bails nice and quickly. But has he got back in time? Yes. That's fine. He's safe.
picked that! And his area. The googly outside off, McCullum chips the ball over mid-off, and gets four.
five wides! Down leg and McCullum misses a sweep. Karthik misses his collection too, resulting in five wides.
on the pads, worked away down to short fine leg for a run.
ah, that's too wide. The googly and wide outside off, sliced away through point for four. Picks a slim gap.
another dot! Flat outside off, pushed to cover
the googly, picks him well. McCullum backs away, reads the googly and defends. Two dots in three balls.
overpitched on leg, driven to long-on for a run. Kohli easing himself into this innings, but hardly any dot balls.
some flight outside off, driven to cover from the crease
on middle and leg, a calm drive to long-on. Seven off the over.
terrific shot, good stop too! Some flight and Kohli flicks him with the wrists through midwicket. The long-on fielder dives to his right to save some runs
the leading edge, just wide of cover. Lots of flight, the googly. McCullum looks to work the ball into the leg side but the leading edge just evades the diving fielder
nicely bowled, the line is better, so is the length. It's wider outside off, turning in. But Kohli drives effortlessly to long-on
drops it short down leg, worked away to deep square leg for a single
a flat delivery on leg, worked away to deep midwicket for one
the googly, reads it yesterday. On middle, worked to deep midwicket
an overpitched delivery on off, worked away to deep midwicket for two. Can't undo Kohli with wristspin easily.

taken at short third man! Another indicator that de Kock did not read Piyush Chawla. A legbreak on middle and off, de Kock looks for a reverse sweep, takes a thick leading edge and lobs to short third man. Legspin comes with extra revolutions and very very often top edges too.

short_text: Chawla to de Kock, no run
long_text: a fine paddle sweep, slow outside off, a fine tap to short fine leg.

short_text: Chawla to de Kock, no run
long_text: the googly! De Kock does not pick that! The googly outside off, de Kock plays for some legspin but the ball keeps drifting on and beats the bat

short_text: Chawla to de Kock, FOUR runs
long_text: and then he bowls full and wide outside off, de Kock is welcomed to his new franchise with an overpitched delivery outside off. And de Kock drills a drive through cover to open his RCB account.
that's tripe from Vinay Kumar. He goes on the pads and McCullum says thanks with a neat flick through backward square leg. Too easy. 14 off 6 for Baz.
there comes the charge. Back of a length on middle and leg, a big swing and miss. Extra bounce
that's cleared fine leg! A short delivery on middle and leg, McCullum pulls but gets a thick top edge which flies over fine leg. McCullum has 9000 T20 runs too
nice length on a new pitch. 136 kph, full outside off. McCullum stands in his crease and defends to cover.
better from Vinay Kumar. Full and on a length, defended back
what a terrible start from Vinay Kumar. And what a delightful start for Mccullum for his new franchise. On the pads and McCullum tickles this easily behind square for four.
backs away and carves this over extra cover. Those are the winning runs.  Kings XI open their campaign with an emphatic win.
smashed back. Sitting up for him to belt and he did just that. No chance for long off even though the ball was just a few yards away. Packs a punch when he belts them
full and straight outside off, Miller looking to make room and carve it behind point but has to reach out as he drives to sweeper cover.
drills this slower ball down to long on
belts this full toss on middle to deep square leg
yorker length on middle, squeezed to long on.  No-ball because Delhi had only three fielders inside the ring.  Time for a free hit
drags this pull from outside off towards deep square leg
whips this length ball on middle to deep midwicket
works this length ball on middle and leg to deep square leg
lofted but on the bounce to long on. Stoinis grimaces because he didn't get any power behind that
looks to work this square of the wicket, but is beaten by delivery that comes back in to hit him on the pad
swung and a miss. This cut back in, kept low and just missed the stumps by a whisker
dabbed past the slip fielder, Iyer comes around from deep point to cut that off
backs away and lofts this cleanly into the gap at deep cover. Used the width superbly. Poor from Tewatia, too short.
fired down leg as he sees the batsman looking to play a reverse sweep, misses.
plays a delicate dab to short third man for a quick single
steps out and whips this from outside off towards deep midwicket
gets outside the line of the stumps and paddles this down to fine leg
right into the blockhole, squeezed to long on
drilled back down the ground, long-off comes around to cut that off. Shows the full face of the bat to hit this back, wow it just flew off the blade.

this time he picks the man out at deep midwicket. Another short ball outside off, Nair pulls, hits it very well but found Boult, who did superbly well to move low to his right to take this catch. Look of disbelief on his face as he walks off.
squeezes this yorker back to the bowler.

swung away to clear wide long on. That's a 31-ball half-century for Nair. Too short, he picked the length early and walloped this into the stands. Comes against the franchise that let him go too. Takes his helmet off and points to the crest. Top knock. Now to finish this off.
slips this down leg, Nair looks to help this past short fine but can't lay bat to it. Rolls to the fielder there off the thigh pad.
waits for the turn on this googly as he works it to deep midwicket. This was on the shorter side, so Miller had enough time to adjust and play it off the backfoot
works this full delivery into the gap at deep midwicket
too full on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket. Excellent work by Boult
drags this sweep from outside off to short fine. This was fired full outside off by Mishra. Pressure building?
gets a good stride forward and smothers the turn as he works this to deep square. This was another googly
deceived by the googly, leading edge to cover as he looks to work this to the leg side
slides on, Miller punches this to sweeper cover. They're walking this
chipped back over the bowler's head, down to long on. Nair wanted to hit that a lot square
makes room and slaps this short delivery to sweeper cover
works this full delivery from middle and off to wide long on
punches this shortish delivery to cover
touch short, Miller goes back into the crease and punches this to long on
works this with the spin to deep midwicket, sensible stuff.
tossed up on leg stump, worked to deep midwicket
uppish but wide of cover, down to the sweeper. They took a chance with the second and made it because Iyer's throw was wayward.
nearly sneaked through the gap between bat and pad. Looked to work to the leg side but played outside the line.  Saved by a thin inside edge
works this tossed up delivery down to long on
leading edge but safe, over the bowler's head to long off
thick outside edge as he turns the bat face to work to the leg side, Mishra dives full length to his left to stop that at short third man
quicker one on the stumps, worked against the line to long on
skiddy delivery outside off, left alone. Very close to the wide line
slow, sharp turn back in from off stump, defended towards midwicket
flatter one on off, punched to cover
slaps this to the cover boundary. Half-tracker outside off, asking to be hit. Miller walloped that away
googly but this is tossed up way outside leg, turned to deep square
turns this gently into the midwicket region
whips this length ball towards deep midwicket, excellent running. Boult a little late to move to his left
pulled in front of square to Shreyas at deep midwicket
eased with the spin to long off
Mishra is back and starts with a rubbish delivery down leg. Nair pounces on it quickly, paddled wide of short fine leg.
eased with the spin to long off
slides back in and skids through to hit the pad as Nair looks to work this gently into the leg side
skids through after pitching on off, squeezed towards point for a quick single
googly that drifts in from around the stumps, worked to midwicket
the painful innings is over, pressure was building and Yuvraj has hit this straight to deep midwicket. Stepped out to pull, but didn't get any power behind that because he got it high on the bat.
slider that  beats Yuvraj  as he prods forward to defend
flicks this full toss on middle to midwicket
opens the bat face late to steer this wide of the keeper. Played it very late, got enough bat on it. Clever little dab.
the power of his wrists and forearm, wow! This is a length ball sitting up to be hit outside off and Nair whips this from outside off, beats wide long-on. Delightful timing.
scintillating from Karun! This is overpitched from Shami and he drills this over extra cover. Top shot
works this off his pads to deep midwicket
bunts this wide of the keeper as they scamper a quick single. Very risky
leading edge that rolls to mid-off. Yuvraj was looking to work this square on the leg side.
slower and fuller on the stumps, Yuvraj shows the full face of the bat in defence.
this length ball nips back in from outside off, defended back
plays the short-arm jab down to deep midwicket
looks to drive, gets it off the inner half of the bat, rolls down to long on
pulls this slower length ball down to long on
looks to drive, gets a thick inside edge back to the bowler. Yuvraj struggling for timing suddenly.
late on the pull, the ball rolls off the toe end to the keeper.
pulls and misses. Beaten for pace, also had to fetch it from outside off.
steers this length delivery down to square third man
clean strike down the ground, sails over long off. Made room and simply hit through the line. Mind-blowing timing
gets this to straighten from length, Nair hops back and blocks
looks to flay this cut but this one keeps a touch low to beat the underedge. On the bounce to Rishabh Pant
right to the pitch of the ball as he caresses the drive to extra cover
thick outside edge that beats third man. Shaped to play a square drive, genuine edge but no slip in place. Frustration for Delhi.
nearly dragged this back onto the stumps. Shaped to drive, got a thick inside edge past leg stump
shows the full face of the bat and defends this length ball back

full and straight on the stumps from wide of the crease, Karun is standing deep inside the crease and so has enough time to bring his wrists into play to put this into the gap at midwicket. Lovely timing.
ripper of a yorker, superb from Boult, Yuvraj just about manages to get his bat down in time to keep it out.

the party is over. Shami takes an excellent catch running backwards at short third man. This is a full toss that angles away, Rahul looks to cleverly whip this behind square but ends up getting a leading edge. Shami called early, made ground and was in total control as it descended. Rahul has done his job though.
full and straight on the stumps, squeezed down to long on
mistimes this pull to midwicket. This was a touch too full, was in no position to play the stroke.
driven on the up, one bounce to Morris at mid off. The bat face turned in his hand as he made contact
was lining himself to pull but beaten by the pace, ends up defending back
steers this slower length ball down to square third man
scintillating straight drive, but a little too straight. Smashes into the stumps at the bowler's end.
fire with fire. Drops short, Yuvraj picks the length early, swivels back and pulls him all along the ground to the square leg boundary.
starts off with a short ball on middle, Yuvraj ducks under this one
drills this straight to mid on. Agarwal checked his shot, not sure why, and has to go as Shami takes a comfortable catch.
joins the party as he slams this length delivery over extra cover. Sailed over the ropes. Made room and used his forearm power to loft this. Woah, sensational.
tries to cut a short one and loses shape due to lack of room and gets beaten
fastest IPL fifty. KL Rahul, take a bow! A fuller one and Rahul comes down the track and meets the pitch before driving down the pitch to long-on
short again, this is tripe from Mishra. Line, length, all no good. Short and no turn and Rahul pulls it away to midwicket
Mishra slides one into the pads now and Rahul gets down for a sweep and top-edges it to deep fine leg as he falls over
oh, dear! What short of a delivery is that! Mishra drops it short and Rahul backs away and carts it over long-off. Slapped away
shot! Rahul producing a masterclass here. Advances down the ground to a loopy one and splits cover and extra cover with a neat drive

short of a length on off, punched down to mid-on, and a bit of miscommunication on the single. Rahul wants it and is sent back. Rahul puts in the dive and hurts his shoulder. Clutches it. Could have been the ball hitting him.
short of a length, jumps and runs it down to third man with an open face
short of a length outside off, Rahul doesn't entirely get behind the line this time and doesn't middle it. Whipped away off the inside of the bat through square leg
six more. Shami bangs it in and angles it in around middle and leg, and Rahul gets the angle he's looking for to swivel and smoke it over fine leg
good length around middle, flicked between midwicket and square leg
length ball that slides on middle, flicked to midwicket
make that a hat-trick of fours. Too much width on offer outside off, and that's Rahul's cue to open up his arms and shovel it through sweeper cover
short of a length, angled across, Rahul gets the front leg out and punches it through extra cover
a top-edged six. That's an outrageous six. Rahul simply swiped at a short of a length ball around leg stump and had zero room. Just carries all the way over fine leg
elegantly punches a fullish delivery with a straight bat but straight to mid-off
short of a length, pitching outside leg, tucked off the pads to midwicket
fuller outside off, Rahul drills down the pitch

full, straight and the off stump has been flattened. This one reversed in late to beat the swing. Christian went for the glory hit but couldn't get under the length. Superb delivery. Outstanding stuff.
mistimes a hoick, Tye runs to his right at deep midwicket and stops it with a sliding tackle, ends up deflecting it off his boot to Stoinis. Saved a couple of runs
flat-batted pull that just eludes Tye, who was running around from deep midwicket. Hits the advertising triangle on the bounce.16 deliverie
full and straight on the stumps, looks to swing over long on but ends up getting a thick inside edge towards deep midwicket
right into the blockhole, he backs away and squeezes this to long off
pulled from outside off towards deep square leg
muscled over long on. He had the free license. Used the depth of the crease to convert this full delivery into a nice half-volley as he teed off in style. Brings up the 150 as well.
surely that's one warning for a beamer. This perhaps slipped out as he tried a back-of-the-hand slower ball. Had the batsman on the floor, Rahul scampers to his left to stop that.
makes room to carve this behind point but Tye bowls this full and straight outside off. Beaten
slaps this full delivery outside off towards long off
looks to swing over midwicket, but mistimes this waist-high full toss down the ground.  Morris has a quizzical look on his face
can't get the elevation as he looks to drill down to long-on, straight to the fielder.
good work by KL Rahul, moved swiftly to his left to stop what could've been a four down leg. This deflected off the pad as he looked to step out and whip it square
goes across the stumps and works this to deep square leg. That's a day's pay well earned. Superb spell
this one spins away from off stump, eased to long off
just a gentle little push down to long-on, shouldn't have been two. Very easily done
punches this down to long on for an easy single
keeps a touch low, he rocks back and pulls to deep square leg.
squeezes the drive to point
punches this length delivery to cover
he's clobbered this and it sails over long on. Steps out and swings this length delivery up and over. Held his pose for the cameras as well. Clean striking right out of the top drawer
punches this length delivery to cover, a direct hit at the bowler's end and it would've been interesting.
slower length ball on off stump - back-of-the-hand stuff - worked behind square towards short fine leg.
full delivery that tails away a hint from off stump, driven to deep cover
walks across the stumps and whips this length ball down to long on
the flipper from Ashwin, hurried on to beat him for pace, somehow managed to get some bat on it as he squeezed it out.
drifts in a full delivery on the pads, turned to deep square leg
squeezes the drive to point for a quick single

one switch hit too many and is gone. This is not the most intelligent piece of cricket from Tewatia. Ashwin outfoxes him by getting to drift in, spin away just a wee bit to hit him on the box as he swung through. As plumb as decisions can get.
legbreak on the pads, turned to long on
full on middle and leg, eased to long on

direct hit and Gambhir's bat is on the line.  Would've been even through an inkling of a dive. Gambhir was lazily ambling down the surface and has paid the price. Coming back to the delivery, this was clipped straight to short fine leg. Nevertheless, this has been an excellent innings from Gambhir. Weathered the early storm and set them up for a strong finish. Mujeeb continues to have a field day
full on the pads, whipped over the infield, on the bounce to deep square leg
chipped over the infield, no one at cover. Single taken
slapped over the infield, on the bounce to deep extra cover
slower and fuller outside off, he mistimes a drive to the edge of the ring at cover, quick single
looks to scoop this fine but is off balance, gets it high on the bat but this lands short of Mujeeb at short fine leg.  Mujeeb picked it late and was late to move forward
prods outside the line, gets a thick inside edge towards deep midwicket
the switch hit over backward point. Has done effectively what Munro didn't. First ball, sighters anyone? No, boss. Not needed. What a hit
works this from outside off towards long on
bunts this back towards the bowler.

hje's misread the googly and has paid the price! Steps out to hoick this into the leg side but doesn't quite get to the pitch and slices this to cover where Tye was running backwards from the infield, wasn't in balance but somehow managed to hold on to the swirler. Superb catch. Mujeeb's superb initiation into the IPL continues.
drilled past the bowler, beats long on. Solid hit. Got to the pitch and hammered it. Pant is in top form, batting as if he was netting somewhere before coming in
yorker-length on off stump, squeezed to long off
too short, Pant helps him over short fine. Cleverly done. This was a slower ball gone wrong.
sliced over the infield, down to deep point
slaps this away-going length ball to deep cover

this is hammered deep into the stands at deep midwicket. This is the kind of game he struggled to bring to the fore when he was playing for India. This is a length ball, Pant was waiting for it as he muscled it away. Too much power off the bottom hand.
hoicked from outside off, gets this one bounce into the ropes at deep square leg. Dragged this a long way, lucky to get away with it.
swept away towards deep midwicket as they jog the single
gentle little dab into the off side for a quick single.  36th IPL fifty.  Equals Warner's record for most half-centuries in the competition

run out missed at the bowler's end by KL Rahul.  Big mix-up. Pant looks to hoick but misses, hits the pad and deflects behind the stumps. He wanted a leg bye but was sent back. The throw at the bowler's end is very, very wide.
top-edges a slog sweep,  falls in no man's land.  Axar from deep midwicket. Miller from wide long on and neither can get there. For a while,  they were on a collision course
swept fiercely, down to deep square leg
quicker length ball on middle from around the stumps, punched to midwicket
slower and fuller on off stump, squeezed to long off
driven firmly to sweeper cover again for a single
full and angling away, Pant drills this to wide long off where Karun Nair can't bend down in time to cut that off. Tried to parry it. Lazy effort, should've been stopped
sways out of this short ball angling away
turns this length ball on middle to mid on.

comes back and strikes immediately. Vijay looks to pull this short ball but this skids through to beat him for pace, gets elevation on this short-arm jab but can't generate power and long on takes a comfortable catch.
short of a length around off, pulled away to square leg
full toss on middle and leg, whipped away between long-on and deep midwicket, the latter gets around it
full, pushed across outside off, driven to long-on for one
full and angled in at middle and off, clipped away wide of long-on
short of a length on off, Gambhir waits on the backfoot and pulls to the right of deep midwicket for one
fullish length, sliding in, tucked off the pads to deep square leg

short_text: Axar Patel to Gambhir, no run
long_text: steps out to whip, got into a tangle as he played early because Axar slowed it down. Hit on the pad, manages to get back into the crease.

short_text: Axar Patel to Gambhir, FOUR runs
long_text: paddled over short fine. Not entirely in control, it looked like, but it flew over the infield. Axar once again punished for firing it in. Hasn't learnt.
gets a thick inside edge on a hoick to deep midwicket
sees Gambhir advancing and fires this in, whipped to deep midwicket
this time, he hits this lofted drive on the bounce to Miller at long off
cleanly lofted inside out, extremely well done by Miller at long off. Ran a good 15 yards to his left and then dished out a full-length swimming pool dive to cut that off
punched back, Ashwin can't get across in time to stop it off his own bowling despite doing all the hard work in running to his right, down to long on

beauty. This grips and spins away sharply to beat Vijay's outside edge as he looked to work across the line. Delightful legbreak. Drew him forward, got this to bounce. Kumble would've been proud of that.
legbreak gone wrong, slips this down leg. Vijay sweeps and misses
drifts in a quicker delivery on middle and leg, worked towards midwicket
first of the legbreaks from Ashwin , turned across the line towards midwicket
flatter one on middle and leg, worked towards the man coming in from deep midwicket. Vijay was made to stretch quite a bit there as he scampered back
steps out, opens up the off side and lofts this inside out to deep extra cover. Had control over his stroke, just a gentle chip

short_text: Axar Patel to Shankar, no run
long_text: driven straight to extra cover

finally flighted one, got it to turn and has been rewarded. This is much slower through the air, Iyer is drawn forward as he shapes to drive but couldn't get to the pitch. The faint nick has been well taken by Rahul behind the stumps.
leading edge but trickles down to long off. Looked to clip this over midwicket
fired into the pads, turned to deep midwicket

short_text: Axar Patel to Iyer, SIX runs
long_text: hammered over the ropes, into the second tier. Right to the pitch as he steps out and swings this over the bowler's head. Too much power. Clean ball-striking.
steps out and works this flatter delivery to deep midwicket
stands tall and punches this length ball to extra cover
slips this full delivery down leg, Iyer overbalanced as he misses this flick. Wide called. This was another knuckleball
whips this length ball on middle and leg to square leg

slapped away! Almost as if Gambhir was expecting that. Goes back and across as he powers this pull into the gap at deep square leg. Pulled it from way over his head and yet kept it all along the ground
this is a knuckleball outside off, Gambhir absolutely drills this on the bounce to Yuvraj at mid off
looks to hoick this across the line, lost his shape, and so misses out as he mistimes this to the leg side.
crunching drive but straight to extra cover

height may have saved Iyer. This ball pitches at length on off and skids straight on. Iyer looks to play across the line, misses it and is struck on the flap of his right pad. It comes back as umpire's call.  On field not out stays.  Rod Tucker was the umpire in question.
sharp turn from back in, Rahul fumbles down leg. He's struggling already.
steps out and mistimes this hoick, gets it wide of mid on as they scamper a single
fired full on middle and leg, worked into the gap at deep square leg
steps out and slices this over cover. There was long off specifically for the lofted hit, so he just opened the bat face a little to pick the gap. Top shot, bringing all his experience into play
risky, risky single. Rahul has muffed a take again as the throw comes in from cover point. Gambhir was made to stretch. Makes it in time.
floats this full on off stump, defended back to the bowler
leading edge down to mid off. Expensive over. 17 off it.
gentle little dab into the off side for a quick single

short_text: Axar Patel to Gambhir, SIX runs
long_text: stunning! Did someone say he's a nudger of the ball? This is a lovely stroke, pure cricketing stroke. Backed away, got to the pitch of the ball and lofted it cleanly over mid-off. Sailed over the ropes. Don't think he realised how well he hit it until it landed over the ropes

short_text: Axar Patel to Gambhir, FOUR runs
long_text: crunching stroke this! Fires this full and flat on leg stump, Gambhir goes down on one knee and sweeps him over square leg. One bounce to the fence. Disdainfully done

short_text: Axar Patel to Gambhir, FOUR runs
long_text: clears his front leg, makes room and goes inside-out over cover. Typical Gambhir stroke. Lovely timing
driven with the spin to wide long off.
toe-ends a slog from way outside off towards mid on
this spins away from length on off stump, defended wide of cover for a quick single
spins back in sharply to beat Iyer's push, deflects off the pad to short fine leg

dream IPL beginning for Mujeeb as Munro has fallen to an attempted switch hit. Doesn't even bother reviewing because he was plumb. Mujeeb got this full delivery to drift in from around the stumps, Munro got himself into a tangle in trying to reverse sweep, and once he missed he was a dead duck. Massive strike!
steps out and drives this full delivery to wide long-off. Didn't hit this off the middle.
shapes to cut but chops it into the off side. This skidded through, no turn
length ball that kept a touch low, Gambhir works this from outside off towards midwicket
hits the deck hard at length, Munro punches this towards mid off for a quick single
opens the bat face late to steer this away-going delivery to square third man. Typical Gambhir stroke
looks to force this but mistimes the drive to mid-off, scampers across for a quick single even as a throw comes in from Yuvraj
beauty that nips away late from length to miss the outside edge. KL Rahul is beaten by the zip on this and fumbles as they take a bye.
mistimes this cut to point
drifts in a full delivery on middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
pushed through quicker on middle and leg, tucked wide of midwicke

smart stumping from KL Rahul. Munro beaten by sharp turn. Excellent change of pace from Ashwin. Munro has no clue about this as he jabs at the delivery. He dragged his back foot outside the crease for a brief moment, but managed to just about plonk it back in. Lucky break
nicely tossed up on off stump, Gambhir eases this down to long-off
slides back in from wide of the crease, Gambhir works this into the gap at square leg. Ashwin got this to drift back in a long way
quicker delivery drifting into middle and leg, tucked wide of midwicket for a quick single

CSK mark their return with a stunning win! Overpitched and outside off, Mustafizur loses his length, Jadhav leans back, uses the depth of the crease, and belts it through the covers. Cracking finish from Bravo and Jadhav

Jadhav shovels it all the way over short fine leg for a six. WHAT A CRAZY SHOT. Jadhav, you beauty. He shuffles across off, drops down to one knee - injured hamstring and all - and ramps it all the way to the boundary. He might not have ventured this shot had fine leg been back. Is this the game? Tahir runs across from the other end and hugs Jadhav
good length and slanting away outside off, Jadhav opens his face and dabs it straight to short third man
slower cutter on the leg stump, shovels it straight to short fine leg
full on leg stump, cramps the batsman for room, worked to the leg side

Bumrah stays round the wicket but shifts his length. Bumrah ventures shorter and wider outside off, Bravo loses his timing and his head. He splices a catch to Rohit at extra cover. Bravo was aiming for the signature loft over extra cover but it got big on him
Bravo is carrying CSK home. Low full-toss on middle stump, Bravo clears his front leg and wallops it into the stands beyond midwicket for the third six of the over
slower yorker, 112ks, Bravo jabs his bat down and the ball trickles back onto the stumps. But the bails refuse to budge. Drama in Mumbai
good length and outside off, run down to short third man. Bravo chances a single. Mustafizur fumbles and they pinch an extra run via an overthrow
full-toss on middle stump, Bumrah isn't getting his lengths right. Bravo sizes it up and smites it over midwicket for back-to-back boundaries. Deejay Bravo is having CSK fans grooving to his tunes
Bumrah misses his yorker. Goes too full and outside off, Bravo collapses his back leg and lofts it over over the long-off boundary
Bravo uses his feet, meets a full-toss, and splices it over the bowler's head
shorter on middle as Bravo steps out and crunches a pull to the left of deep midwicket for another boundary. Mitch McC continues to leak runs in the death
yorker outside leg, jammed out to wide long-on. Bravo hares back for the second
full and veering into the pads, Bravo picks it up and launches it over the midwicket boundary. Not middled but enough to clear the man in the deep
very full on middle, Bravo gets underneath the length hoists it over the bowler's head with utter nonchalance. Shot
wide yorker, squeezed down to third man
off-stump yorker, squeezed back to the bowler
banged in short and homing in at the rib cage, Bravo hops and is cramped for room. He wears it on the body
clipped off the pads to fine leg
back of a length and veering down the leg side, Wood picks it up and hits it straight into the lap of Mustafizur at long leg
bouncer on middle, Wood is beaten for pace as he misses the pull
Pandya ventures another slower ball and floats it down the leg side
full and drifting down the leg side for a wide
back of a length on off, Bravo splices a pull over midwicket
low full-toss on off, whipped to deep square leg
really full and outside off, opens the face and squeezes it to backward point
short and wide outside off, Wood secures a single to third man
full on middle, 140.3ks, slammed down to long-on
slower offcutter on off stump, Bravo checks his shot and pushes it back to the bowler
full and outside off, Bravo opens up his hips and scythes it flat and hard over extra cover. Hits the ad boards on the flush
off-stump yorker, jammed out to the covers
slower bouncer, slanting away outside the off stump. Harbhajan can only ramp it straight down the throat of Bumrah at deep third man
wild leg-side wide
full on the pads, clipped to deep square lag again
whipped off the hips to deep square leg
very full and dips on leg stump, leading-edges it to the left of the bowler
Bravo makes room outside leg, and scythes it up and over extra cover. Beats sweeper to his right
full and angling across off, Harbhajan reaches out for the ball and slices it away past backward point. Mitch McC makes a royal mess of it at third man and lets the ball to the boundary
pitched up on off, forward and driven to sweeper cover
full cutter outside off, Bravo throws his bat at the ball and slices an outside edge to the left of short third man
short on middle, shovelled to midwicket
good length and outside off, slapped to wide long-off
full on middle, pushed down to long-off
Markande lobs it up outside off and gets it to break back in. Chahar does not spot the change-up. He has a leg-side slog and misses. Kishan swipes the bails off in a flash
full and sliding down leg, clips the pad and wanders away behind square
Such a smooth swing from Bravo. Looped up full on middle, dances down the track and launches it over the bowler's head
googly, finishes on the pads, worked away behind square on the leg side
sliced with the turn to backward point for one
full and spins away outside off, tapped to cover

Jadeja goes and with it CSK's hopes? Whippy cutter from Mustafiz, the line is wide of off, Jadeja gets more height as opposed to distance. He eventually toe-ends a catch to Suryakumar running in from long-off
full and angling across off, speared down to long-off
Jadeja rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and cuts to deep point
overpitched and outside off, Jadeja stretches out and laces this half-volley to the right of the bowler and left of mid-off
slower offcutter, deflected square on the leg side
back of a length and outside off, steered down to third man
short and skids on outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
down the track and pushed down to long-off
stabbed wide of backward point
starts on off and spins away, dabbed to cover
tossed outside off, Jadhav steps down the track, meets the pitch, and hoists it over long-on
full and outside off, eased down to long-on
slower knuckle ball on off, guided off the face to backward point
Jadeja darts down the track, dug in shorter on middle, splices a pull over midwicket
full and slanting away outside off, tipped into the covers
picked off the pads to the right of deep midwicket
full and straight, tucked to square leg
back of a length, kicks up, and beats the cut
Jadhav ventures down the pitch, Pandya floats it wide outside off
tossed on leg stump, bunted to midwicket
lobbed up outside off and viciously breaks away outside off. Jadeja chases after this big-turning googly and is left overbalanced. The keeper whips the bails off but Jadeja's foot remained grounded
floated up on off, presses forward and works to midwicket

Markande catches Dhoni on the crease. Umpire Gaffney shoots down the appeal but Mumbai choose to review. This is pretty plumb. Another skiddy googly, full and breaks back in to beat the inside edge and hit the back pad in line with middle stump. Dhoni did not pick the variation. This is cannoning into middle stump. The tracker returns three reds. Umpire Gaffney reverses his decision and sends Dhoni back. Where will CSK go from here?
down the track and forced down to long-on off the inside half
Dhoni forays down the track, takes a full-toss and clips to wide long-on
good length and outside off, helped to third man
full and outside off, forward and driven to extra cover, where the fielder lets the ball burst through his hands
shuffles across and works a length ball to the right of mid-on
full and outside off, shovelled with the bottom hand to mid-on
wide of the crease and angling into a front-foot push down the pitch. Front-foot no-ball
on a length on off, defended back
back of a length and outside off, ignored
dropped short and wide outside off, Jadhav rocks back and slaps it to sweeper cover

skiddy googly, breaks back in, cramps the batsman for room and hits the back pad. This is close but the on-field umpire shoots down the lbw appeal. Missing leg stump? Nope. Ball-tracking suggests it would have hit leg stump
tossed on off, Dhoni steps out and works a single to midwicket

Markande strikes with his third ball on IPL debut. Rayudu has a word with Jadhav and decides against a review. This is plumb. Flatter googly, breaks in, too full for the sweep. This would have crashed into middle stump
pretty full and outside off, tapped to point again. Markande begins with two dots
full and spins away outside off, guided to point

Caught Pandya bowled Pandya. Hardik tests Raina with a short ball on middle, the batsman backs away outside leg and flaps a pull to mid-on. Good overhead catch from Krunal. Raina has been bounced out again
knuckle ball, opens the face and guides it to backward point. They chance a single. Raina doesn't even bother to dive. A direct hit could have had Raina
off-stump yorker, dug back to the bowler
shuffles across and works it away square of short fine leg
full and wide, toe-ends a drive to mid-off
back of a length and just a shade outside off, blocked to the off side
middle-stump yorker, backs away and digs it out to mid-off
Raina backs away outside leg, banged in short on middle, Raina slashes and does not connect
fuller on off, moves across off and whips it through midwicket
full and skidding into leg stump, hangs back and works it away to square leg
back of a length on middle, Rayudu moves away outside leg, creates swinging room and crashes it over point
full on off, shuffles across and clips it into the vacant spaces at midwicket
on a length and outside off, Rayudu drives it on the up and creams it away to the cover boundary
full and outside off, Rayudu presses forward, opens the face and guides to backward point
Hardik provides Mumbai with the breakthrough. Slower knuckle ball at 120ks from Hardik. Watson does not pick the variation. He is early into his pick-up shot and skies it to Lewis at long leg
full and wide outside off, Watson reaches out for the ball and drives it all the way over extra cover for a flat six. Sublime timing. Shot of the day?
back of a length and outside off, guided to third man
short and slanting in at the top of off, fended to the off side. He's still in discomfort
down the track, hoicked across the line to deep square
short on off, Watson rides it down to third man
back of a length and outside off, eased to third man
on a length and outside off, run down to third man
short and angling in at the top of off, 146ks, fended back to the bowler
full, wide of the crease, slanting in, Watson plays around his front pad and pushes to mid-on
pitched up and outside off, Rayudu presses forward, drives it on the up, and finds the gap at the covers
pitched up on middle, check-pushes to mid-off
good length on middle, breaks away, tipped to the covers
another slower cutter, 120.8ks, Watson does not pick the variation again. He aims a biiiig drive and misses
length ball on off, slower cutter, tapped back down the pitch
pitched up and angling across off stump, Watson stretches out and slices it up and over the covers
Rayudu dashes down the track, manufactures a half-volley, and smears it over the top of mid-off
full and speared into the pads, worked off the back foot to square leg
back of a length and angling across off, run down to third man
very full and angling across off, pushed off the front foot wide of mid-off
back of a length and skidding in, Watson is cramped up as he inside-edges the ball beside his feet. Mitch McC swoops in and attacks the ball. Rayudu slides his bat in time
very full and slanting away outside off, Watson shoulders arms

pretty full on off, Hardik can't get under it. He hacks it off the inside half to deep midwicket. He collides with Bravo and collapses at the non-striker's end. So, Mumbai have to settle with a single
slower ball outside off, 102.3ks, dragged away to wide long-on for two
wide of the crease, ripping yorker at leg stump, floors Hardik. He just about manages to dig it out
really full and outside off, driven down to long-off
short and angling away outside off, swing and a miss
dipping full-toss on the leg stump, strikes the batsman right on the foot

Wood can't nail his lengths but Krunal keeps nailing his shots. Dug short on middle, not short enough. Krunal launches a pull over the backward square leg boundary. Wood ends with 4-0-49-0 on IPL debut
banged in short and outside off, Krunal skies a pull over midwicket. The ball eludes Rayudu running in from the deep
Krunal slinks away outside leg, shorter on middle, bounces over the bat
Wood can't nail the yorker at all. Overpitched another one and watches Krunal thump him straight down the ground
slightly overpitched and outside off, Krunal gets underneath the length and drives it firmly between the bowler and mid-off inside the circle
wide of the crease, full-toss on middle, Pandya middles it straight to deep square leg
wide yorker, sneaks under the bat. Three dots to end the over. Gold
full cutter outside off, 95ks, Krunal swings early at this offcutter and misses
leg-stump yorker, squeezed back to the bowler
full and angling in on middle, whipped out to deep midwicket
full and floated into the pads, clipped to deep square leg
wide of the crease, 103ks, full and outside off, dragged through midwicket off the inside half
Krunal backs away outside leg and jabs a yorker through the covers. This was a fine ball from Wood: right in the blockhole. Krunal still manages to find the boundary. Make it 19 off the over
full and angling in on middle, tapped down to long-on
Krunal moves across off again, Wood sprays it down leg for a wide
Krunal moves across off, this is dug short on middle, Krunal adjusts and pulls it away fine of short fine leg
off-stump yorker, dug away to third man
Krunal backs away outside leg and squeezes a single down to long-on
hip-high short ball on off stump, slower one, Krunal reads the variation and forces the pull over the midwicket boundary
dipping fuller one on leg stump, clipped off the pads through square leg for one
fullish length around off, drilled off the inside part of the bat towards midwicket
full toss, tries the slower one and slips out of the hand as he rolls his fingers over it, punched down to long-on
short of a length around off, not much room, and he hangs back and opens the face to backward point where Mark Wood misfields
full, shapes away and runs past the flashing blade of Krunal Pandya
shortish, comes into Hardik, who gets an under-edge that misses the leg-stump
tossed up legbreak, spins in, played back to the bowler
overpitched and angling away outside off, Krunal leans into it and caresses a drive through the covers for a first-ball four
Tahir sets off on a celebratory run to marine drive. Topspinner, sliding away outside off, Kishan has a mighty slog at it and only sends a top-edge to short third man
tossed on off, pushed to mid-on
dangled up outside off and spins away, Pandya does not meet the pitch and winds up inside-edging it behind square
very full and slides on middle, defended back
wide of the crease, Wood hits a hard length, on off, jabbed to the covers off the back foot
wide of the crease, dug short and outside off, Pandya arches his back and ramps it over the vacant cordon. He loves playing this shot
wide of the crease, slanting in at 139.3ks, this low full-toss is stabbed back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, hacked away to sweeper cover
back of a length on middle, 142ks, punched past the right of the bowler
140.2ks short ball aimed at the head, Hardik Pandya brings out a duck-pull. He looks away, ducks, and pulls it away fine past the keeper
short, wide, slapped to sweeper. Watson has given CSK some breathing space
hip-high short ball on leg stump, swatted to deep square leg
back of a length and outside off, slapped away to sweeper cover

Watson has bounced out Suryakumar Yadav. Harbhajan who caught the ball at deep square leg lets out a big roar and fiercely kicks the ball away. Chest-high short ball on off stump, rushes the pull and the top edge is held by Harbhajan in yellow
wide yorker, sneaks under the bat
back of a length on middle, gets inside the line and pulls to long leg
on a length and skids on outside off, Suryakumar reaches out for the ball but can't touch it
big dipper from Bravo but the line is wrong - on leg stump - paddled away to fine leg
slower cutter on off, 105ks, patted down to long-on
seam-up. Overpitched and outside off, Suryakumar hits over the top again. He creams it up and over extra cover
slower full ball outside off, Suryakumar forces the ball in the air. Jadeja leaps to his left but the ball bursts out of his hands
seam-up short ball on off stump, Suryakumar sizes it up and pulls flat and hard over midwicket. Bam!
Tahir fires it full and outside off, flat-batted straight down the ground. Raina swiftly moves to his left from long-off and gets behind the ball
short and sliding into the hips, flicked in the air. Bravo flings to his right, gets a hand to it, but can't cling onto the chance
speared wide outside off, squeezed through the off side
overpitched and outside off, Kishan belts it away straight of Bravo at long-off. Three boundaries in a row
speared outside off, Kishan drags it in the air, Jadeja, who is a few yards in as opposed to staying at the edge of the boundary, can't collect it. Kishan clears him
floated very full and outside off, drilled through the line to the left of long-off. Bravo slides but lets the ball through to the boundary
Suryakumar Yadav backs away outside leg, Wood runs in hard, hits the pitch harder and finds extra bounce to zip past the bat
skidding into the thigh, deflected behind square on the leg side
shorter and outside off, gets on top of the bounce and punches through the covers
back of a length and on off, Kishan picks it up and swats it away to deep square leg
Kishan advances down the track, Wood responds with a bouncer, and forces the batsman to duck under it
very full on middle, 143ks, jabbed to the off side
low-arm slider outside off, runs past the bat. Time for the time-out
Kishan ventures down the track, Harbhajan drags his length back, whipped away to deep midwicket
low-arm dart on the pads, tucked to deep square leg
darted outside off, Suryakumar stands tall and cracks it in the gap at the covers. Suryakumar keeps Mumbai ticking
back of a length and outside off, backs away and swats it with a flat bat to sweeper. Tahir runs across, slides to his right, and stops the ball
pushed through outside off, stretches out, rolls his wrists, and sweeps it flat and hard behind square
speared outside off, swish and a miss
round-arm dart from Jadeja, Kishan exploits the pace and deftly runs it past Dhoni's left knee
dragged down outside off, instead of smashing it over cover, Kishan hits it straight to the fielder
full and wide outside off, sliced to short third man
dropped short and wide outside off, Kishan reaches out for the ball with his hands and crunnnnnnches it through the covers
pushed through on middle, not much turn, pushed down to long-on
tossed outside off, presses forward and drives through the covers
Kishan dares to use his feet but is beaten in flight, he pokes a single to the leg side
dabbed to slip with soft hands, Raina throws himself to his left to stop the ball
back of a length on off, non-turner, forced down to long-on
shorter and skidding into the thigh from around the stumps, punched down to long-on
looped up on off, stretches out and pushes back to the bowler
Another classy shot from Suryakumar. Watson sprays a full ball onto the pads, Suryakumar picks it up and launches it over the midwicket boundary. He made it look as easy as eating a sandwich
on a length and outside off, whipped with the wrists wide of midwicket
good length and angling in at off, Suryakumar plays early and leading-edges it to the left of Watson
shot, Suryakumar. Stands tall to another back-of-a-length ball outside off and punches it beautifully through the covers. So easy on the eye
pretty full on middle, pushed down to mid-on
chopped from off stump to backward point
on a length and outside off, presses forward and bunts to extra cover
jabbed away to square leg
skiddy short ball outside off, 137ks, Suryakumar can't connect with his pull
back of a length on middle, stabbed to mid-on
gloriously punched through the covers. Back of a length and outside off, he stays leg-side of the ball and stylishly hits it in the gap
back of a length and attacking off, tapped to cover off the back foot
picked off the hips through square leg for a couple

Watson has Rohit holing out to Rayudu running in from backward point. Good length and on off stump, Rohit eyes up the leg side. Instead, he loses his shape and top-edges it hiiiiiigh into the night sky. Rayudu runs in and just hangs on to this skier. Watson roars in delight. CSK mark their return with two early strikes

short_text: Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: back of a length and outside off, leans back and steers to point

short_text: Watson to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs
long_text: full and wide outside off - right in Rohit's swinging arc - he extends his hands and banishes the ball over extra cover after collapsing his back leg. Not middled, but Rohit won't mind
Re-set the radar, Mr. Watson. Floated very full and wide outside off, past the marker, off-side wide

short_text: Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: Watson hits a hard length on off - neither driveable nor pullable - jabbed back to the bowler
back of a length and angling away outside off, Kishan hangs back, rides the bounce, and eases the ball to deep third man
full and on off stump, Rohit can't quite get underneath the length. He slices it up and over mid-off

short_text: Chahar to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: pitched up and largely holds its line on off, tapped up to the covers

short_text: Chahar to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: Chahar continues to tease Rohit. Full outswinger, pitches on and around off and zips away past the bat
down the track and hacked behind square off the inside half
Kishan ventures down the track, nearly yorks himself, and squeezes this inswinger to midwicket

Chahar wins an lbw appeal from umpire Chris Gaffaney. Lewis challenges the on-field out decision. DRS makes an appearance in the IPL. Is this swinging past the leg stump? Nippy inswinger from Chahar, pitches on middle and leg and swerves in to ping the pad as Lewis falls over the leg-side flick. The tracker suggests it would go on to clip the outside of the leg stump. Umpire's call it is and Lewis bags a duck on IPL debut

short_text: Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: on a length and outside off, Rohit allows the ball to come to him, then dabs to point

short_text: Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: even fuller and slanting in at off, Rohit has another mighty hack at it and inside-edges the ball  back to the bowler. CSK bowlers threatening both edges on a grassy pitch

short_text: Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: Watson opens up Rohit but the outside edge does not carry Harbhajan at wide slip. Nice and full, angling in at off, which means Rohit has to play at it. The  ball straightens away and takes the outside edge
length ball, angling in at off stump, Rohit picks it up, flicks early and skews it up and over midwicket

short_text: Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: Rohit saunters down the track, swings wildly at another outswinger, and does not make contact again. Strange shots from Rohit. He usually takes his time to settle down

short_text: Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: on a length and outside off, opens the face and glides the ball to point
full and angling across off stump, Lewis lets it go in the channel
full and veering into the pads, Rohit tucks it away to square leg and gets off strike

short_text: Chahar to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs
long_text: slightly overpitched and outside off, Rohit does not meet the pitch but drives it aerially over the covers

short_text: Chahar to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: beaten three times in a row! Good length and bounces outside off, Rohit hangs his bat out and gets away again

short_text: Chahar to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: on a length and outside off, Chahar finds outswing again, Rohit dares to step out, he has a big whooosh at it  and misses

short_text: Chahar to Rohit Sharma, no run
long_text: Chahar beats the outside edge right away. Nice and full, angling in, then nibbling away late outside off. Rohit has a skittish poke and the ball nearly shaves the outside edge
